text: Guardian.

Redeploy.

Blue character only.

Play only if you have exactly one character.

flavor: The First Order executed every member of the village on Jakku rather than leave any witnesses.
name: Kill Them All
text: Deal 1 damage to each non-unique character your opponents have.

name: Unyielding
text: Resolve any number of your Blue dice showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]) in the order of your choice, treating this damage as unblockable.

name: Insidious
text: Action - Exhaust this support to gain 1 resource if an opponent's character die is showing a blank ([blank]).

name: Hate
text:
Redeploy.
After you activate attached character, you may deal it 1 damage to deal 1 damage to another character.

name: Anarchy
text: Remove one of your Yellow dice. Then deal damage to each of an opponent's characters equal to the value showing on that die.

name: Bounty Postings
text: Draw cards equal to the number of characters an opponent has.

name: Buy Out
text: Spend any number of resources. Then discards cards from the top of an opponent's deck equal to the number of resources you just spent.

name: Coercion
text: Spot a Yellow character to reveal an opponent's hand and choose an event in it. They must play that event as their next action, if able.

name: Only Business Matters
text: Remove any number of your Yellow dice. Then gain 1 resource for each die you just removed.

flavor: The best gear is hard to come by legality.
name: Pilfered Goods
text: You may play an upgrade from your hand for free on each of your Yellow characters.

name: Twin Shadows
text: Spot 2 characters with the same title to remove up to 2 dice.

flavor: The Hutts were powerful gangsters with an interplanetary criminal empire.
name: Hutt Ties
text: Action - Exhaust this support to force an opponent to choose to either lose 1 resource or choose and remove one of their dice.

name: Deadly
text: Action - Exhaust this upgrade and remove one of attached character's dice to deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.

name: No Survivors
text: Deal 1 damage to each of an opponent's damaged characters.

name: Detention Center
text: Action - Exhaust this support to remove a character die. Then any player may remove one of their character dice to discard this support from play.

name: All Quiet On The Front
text: Remove any number of shields from your characters. Then discard cards from the top of an opponent's deck equal to the number of shields you just removed.

name: Entrenched
text: Give 5 shields to your characters, distributed as you wish.

name: Fortuitous Strike
text: Spot a Red character to reroll any number of your dice. Then deal damage to a character equal to the number of dice you just rerolled that are now showing ranged damage ([ranged]).

flavor: "It's risky, but we can't hold out much longer." <cite>Leia Organa</cite>
name: Rearguard
text: Count the number of Red dice you have showing a shield ([shield]). Remove up to that many dice.

name: Reckless Reentry
text: Choose a die on one of your vehicles in play and roll it into your pool. Then discard that vehicle if its die just rolled a blank ([blank]).

name: Strike Briefing
text: Look at the top 3 cards of an opponent's deck and rearrange them in any order. Then you may discard the top card of that deck.

name: Swift Strike
text: Remove a die showing a modifier side (a side with a +).

name: Rally Aid
text: Action - Exhaust this support to reveal a random card in your hand. You may play that card, decreasing its cost by 1, or by 2 instead if it's a vehicle.

name: Shield Generator
text: Before one of your supports would be discarded from play by an opponent's card effect or die, you may instead discard this support from play.

name: At Peace
text: Turn each die that has one or more blanks to a side showing a blank ([blank]).

flavor: "This is your father's lightsaber." <cite>Obi-Wan Kenobi</cite>
name: Bestow
text: Move a non-ability upgrade from one of your Blue characters to another character (return that upgrade's die to its card).

name: Bring Balance
text: Choose an opponent that has more cards in hand than you. Draw cards up to the number of cards in their hand.

name: Reaping The Crystal
text: Play a Blue card that costs 3 or more from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1.

name: Secret Mission
text: Choose a color (Blue, Red, Yellow, or Gray). Then discard the top card of an opponent's deck. If that card is the chosen color, gain 1 resource.

name: Trust The Force
text: Reroll any number of Blue dice.

name: Funeral Pyre
text: Before one of your Blue characters is defeated, you may move an upgrade from it to another one of your characters (return that upgrade's die to its card).

name: Yoda's Quarters
text: Action - Exhaust this support and remove one of your character dice to heal 2 damage from that character.

name: Fearless
text: After you activate attached character, you may give it 1 shield and draw a card.

name: Against The Odds
text: Reroll one of your dice. Then, if it just rerolled the same symbol, you may resolve it, increasing its value by 2.

name: Appraise
text: Remove one of your dice showing a resource ([resource]) to play a support from your hand, decreasing its cost by 2.

name: Bad Feeling
text: Remove one of your dice to reroll any number of dice.

name: Double-Cross
text: Remove one of your Yellow character dice to resolve an opponent's die as if it were your own.

name: Impersonate
text: Move damage among your characters as you wish (this ignores shields and you cannot exceed a character's health while moving this damage).

name: Local Patrol
text: Force an opponent to choose to either lose 1 resource or discard the top 2 cards of their deck.

name: Quick Escape
text: Remove up to 2 dice showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]). You must pass all of your future turns this round.

name: Tenacity
text:
Play only if an opponent has more characters than you.
Exhaust one of that opponent's characters.

name: Running Interference
text: After you take an action, you may set this support aside to choose an opponent. That opponent cannot take the same action that you just took on their next turn.

name: Thermal Paint
text: After you activate attached character, force an opponent to choose and deal 1 damage to one of their characters. Then you may discard this upgrade to deal 1 damage to that character.

name: Defiance
text: Reroll one of your character dice. Then heal damage from that character equal to the value showing on that die.

name: Covering Fire
text: Count the number of dice you have showing ranged damage ([ranged]). Reroll up to that many of an opponent's dice.

name: Deploy Squadron
text: Activate any number of your supports in the order of your choice.

name: Fall Back
text: Each player may choose 1 upgrade, starting with you. Discard all upgrades from play that were not just chosen.

name: Feint
text: Activate one of your characters. Then you may remove all of its character and upgrade dice to ready it.

name: Flanking Maneuver
text: Count the number of support dice in your pool. Deal that much damage to a character.

name: Heat Of Battle
text: Choose an opponent. That opponent turns up to 2 of their dice to sides showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]). Turn up to 2 of your dice to sides showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]).

name: Pinned Down
text: Spot a vehicle to remove a die.

name: The Day is Ours
text: Claim the battlefield, even if an opponent has claimed it this round.

name: Drop Zone
text: After you claim the battlefield, you may place 1 damage on this support. Action - Exhaust this support to move any amount of damage from it to a character (this ignores shields).

name: Tech Team
text: Before you play a support, you may exhaust this support to decrease its cost by 1.

name: Battle of Wills
text: Each player activates one of their characters, starting with you. Then each player totals the value of the character dice they just rolled, and each player with the lowest combined value removes theirs.

name: Force Vision
text: Ambush. Look at the top 5 cards of a player's deck (do not rearrange them).

name: Lightsaber Pull
text: Spot a Blue character to search your deck for a Blue weapon, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: Lightsaber Training
text: Turn up to 2 of your Blue weapon dice to sides of your choice.

name: No Surrender
text: Reroll one of your Blue character dice showing a blank ([blank]). Then you may resolve it.

name: Something Familiar
text: Spot 2 Blue character to reveal a random card from an opponent's hand. Then you may turn a number of dice equal to or less than that card's cost to sides of your choice.

flavor: "I felt a great disturbance in the Force…" <cite>Obi-Wan Kenobi</cite>
name: Voices Cry Out
text: Reroll all dice showing a value of 2 or higher.

name: Keen Instincts
text: Blue character only. Action - Remove one of attached character's character dice to give it 1 shield.

name: Battle Rage
text: Spot a character that has 6 or more damage on it. Resolve one of that character's character dice showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]), increasing its value by 2.

name: Disable
text: Exhaust a support.

name: Persuade
text: Choose an opponent who has less resources than you. Then turn one of their dice to any side.

name: Pickpocket
text: Discard a random card from each opponent's hand. Draw cards equal to the number of cards that were just discarded.

name: Threaten
text: Spot a Yellow character to remove an opponent's character die unless they deal damage to that character equal to the value showing on that die.

name: Trickery
text: Discard your hand. For each card just discarded, you may remove a die showing a value that is equal to that card's cost.

name: Truce
text:
Ambush.
Each player gains 1 resource.

name: Stolen Cache
text: After you play this support, exhaust it. Action - Exhaust this support to gain 1 resource. Discard this support from play.

name: Hidden Agenda
text: Action - Play an event from your hand, decreasing its cost by 2. Discard this upgrade from play.

flavor: Mandalorian armor was renowned for its durability.
name: Mandalorian Armor
text:
After you play this upgrade, give attached character 1 shield.
Attached character can have 1 additional shield.

name: Dangerous Mission
text: Turn a die to a side showing a resource cost.

name: Endurance
text:
Play only if one or more of your dice were removed during an opponent's last turn this round.
Roll one of those removed dice into your pool.

name: Partnership
text: Activate one of your characters and one of your supports. Then you may spend 1 resource to take an additional action.

name: Recycle
text: Discard one of your supports from play. Then gain resources equal to its cost.

flavor: When facing an overpowered adversary, precision often prevails over brute strength.
name: Rend
text: Discard a support or upgrade that costs 0 from play.

flavor: "Come on, BB-8! Hurry!" <cite>Poe Dameron</cite>
name: Roll On
text: Reroll one of your dice. You may reroll that die. You may reroll that die again.

name: Plastoid Armor
text: Attached character gains +1 health.

name: B'Omarr Monastery
subtitle: Teth
text: Claim - Resolve one of your dice showing a modifier side (a side with a +) as if it were not modified.

name: Fort Anaxes
subtitle: Anaxes
text: While you control this battlefield, each of your characters have the Guardian keyword.

name: Garel Spaceport
subtitle: Garel
text: Claim - Remove one of your dice to gain resources equal to half of the value showing on that die, rounded up.

name: Imperial Academy
subtitle: Lothal
text: While you control this battlefield, after you activate a support, you may reroll its die.

name: Main Plaza
subtitle: Vashka
text: Claim - Move 1 damage from a character to this battlefield or move all damage from this battlefield to a character (this ignores shields).

name: Medical Center
subtitle: Kaliida Shoals
text: Claim - Heal 1 damage each from up to 2 different characters. Give control of this battlefield to an opponent.

name: Port District
subtitle: Bespin
text: While you control this battlefield, each card you play that costs 3 or more has the Ambush keyword.

name: Weapons Factory Alpha
subtitle: Cymoon 1
text: While you control this battlefield, the cost of the first vehicle you play each round is decreased by 1.

name: Kylo Ren
subtitle: Tormented One
text: After you activate this character, you may choose a color (Blue, Red, Yellow or Gray). Then reveal a random card in an opponent's hand. If that card matches the chosen color, deal 2 damage to a character.

flavor: "You can't be so stupid as to think this will be easy."
name: Captain Phasma
subtitle: Ruthless Tactician
text: [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if that character has 6 or more damage on it.

flavor: Though superior to standard battle droids, this model of droid was too expensive to deploy in large numbers.
name: Droid Commandos
text: [special] - Deal 1 damage each to any number of characters.

flavor: "My troops will storm this block and kill you all." <cite>Captain Phasma</cite>
name: Captain Phasma's Blaster
text: While this upgrade is attached to Captain Phasma, it has the Redeploy keyword.

name: Praetorian Guard
text: Attached character has the Guardian keyword.

name: Dark Counsel
text: [special] - Draw a card. Reroll this die instead of removing it from your pool.

name: Crossguard Lightsaber
text:
After you play this upgrade on Kylo Ren, deal 1 damage to a character.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if that character has 1 or more shields.

name: Force Stasis
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Remove a die showing ranged damage ([ranged]). Then deal 1 damage to a character.

flavor: "I will find them quickly, Master." <cite>Darth Maul</cite>
name: Jedi Rival
text: After you activate attached character, you may remove 1 shield from a character.

name: Armored Support
text: Action - Exhaust this support to reroll one of your Red dice. If that die rolls damage ([ranged] or [melee]), deal 1 damage to a character.

name: First Strike
text: Deal damage to a character equal to the value on an opponent's die showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]).

name: I Have You Now
text: Turn a die to a side showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]).

name: Imperial Envoy
text: Reveal 2 random cards in an opponent's hand. Then deal 1 damage to a character for each event and support just revealed.

flavor: "Dispatch all squadrons…" <cite>General Hux</cite>
name: Mobilize
text: Gain 4 resources.

name: Tactical Mastery
text: Spot a Red character to take up to 2 additional actions.

name: As I Have Foreseen
text:
Ambush.
Look at each opponent's hand.

name: Clash
text: Turn one of your dice to a side showing melee damage ([melee]). Turn an opponent's die showing melee damage ([melee]) to a blank ([blank]).

name: Intimidate
text: Remove all shields from a character.

flavor: "I see you have constructed a new lightsaber." <cite>Darth Vader</cite>
name: Your Skills Are Complete
text: Turn an upgrade die to a side showing a blank ([blank]).

name: Doubt
text: Reroll an opponent's die. Then that opponent either resolves that die or removes it.

name: Parry
text: Remove a die showing melee damage ([melee]).

flavor: "I won't have you question my methods." <cite>General Hux</cite>
name: Subjugate
text: Remove a die.

name: Hangar Bay
subtitle: Imperial Fleet
text: Claim - Reveal the top card of an opponent's deck. If that card is an event or support, deal 1 damage to a character.

flavor: "The Force, it's calling you." <cite>Maz Kanata</cite>
name: Rey
subtitle: Finding The Ways
text: After you activate this character, if she has 1 or more shields, you may deal 1 damage to a character.

flavor: "The Resistance will not be intimidated by you."
name: Poe Dameron
subtitle: More Than A Pilot
text: [special] - Give a character 1 shield. You may turn another die to any side.

flavor: Unlike biological doctors, medical droids could heal most species due to their extensive databanks.
name: Medical Droid
text: [special] - Heal 1 damage from a character.

name: Strike Team
text:
Ambush.
Decrease the cost to play this support by 1 if an opponent has 3 or more resources.

flavor: "Why I should stick my neck out for you is far beyond my opacity!" <cite>C-3P0</cite>
name: Teamwork
text: [special] - Give attached character 1 shield. You may give another character 1 shield.

name: Poe Dameron's Blaster
text: [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if attached character is Poe Dameron.

name: Rey's Lightsaber
text:
Redeploy.
After you play this upgrade, give attached character 1 shield, or 2 shields instead if attached character is Rey.

name: Inner Strength
text: [special] - Move 1 damage from attached character to an opponent's character with no shields.

flavor: "If Skywalker returns, the new Jedi will rise." <cite>Snoke</cite>
name: Luke's Protection
text: Action - Place this support on top of your deck from play to give a Blue character 1 shield.

name: Honor Guard
text: Action - Discard this support from play to remove a die showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]).

name: Direct Hit
text: Resolve one of your dice showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]), increasing its value by 2.

name: Logistics
text: Spot a red character to resolve a die with the resource symbol ([resource]), increasing its value by 1.

name: Recon
text: Choose a symbol showing on a die. Then turn another die to a side showing the same symbol.

name: Strategic Planning
text: Ready a support that has no mods or exhaust a support.

flavor: "Through the Force, things you will see." <cite>Yoda</cite>
name: Concentrate
text: Turn one of your dice to any side. You may spend 1 resource to turn another one of your dice to any side.

name: Defensive Stance
text: Give a character 2 shields.

flavor: "Maybe it's another drill." <cite>Stormtrooper</cite>
name: Distraction
text: Choose 2 dice. Then an opponent chooses and removes one of those dice.

flavor: "There is no try." <cite>Yoda</cite>
name: Do Or Do Not
text: Reroll one of your dice. Then you may resolve it, increasing its value by 1. Otherwise, remove it.

flavor: "I'll never turn to the dark side." <cite>Luke Skywalker</cite>
name: Fierce Resolve
text: Reroll one of your dice. Then deal damage to a character equal to the value showing on that die.

name: Evade
text: Remove a die showing ranged damage [ranged]

name: Flank
text:
Play only if you have more ready characters than an opponent.
Remove one of that opponent's dice.

name: Sound The Alarm
text: Reroll any number of an opponent's dice showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]).

subtitle: Tatooine
text: Claim - Give a Blue character 1 shield or spend 1 resource to give a non-Blue character 1 shield.

name: Dark Advisor
text: [special] - Draw 3 cards. Then place a card from your hand on the top or bottom of your deck.

flavor: "Formerly Darth, now just Maul."
name: Maul
subtitle: Vengeful One
text: After one or more of this character's character or upgrade dice are removed by an opponent's card effect, you may remove one of their dice.

flavor: "I use dark magick to achieve power."
name: Mother Talzin
subtitle: Nightsister Matriarch
text: After you activate this character, you may reveal the top card of a player's deck. If its cost is an odd number, turn one of that player's dice to any side.

flavor: "There is no mercy."
name: Palpatine
subtitle: Darth Sidious
text: Power Action - Play an event from your hand, decreasing its cost by the number of different damage symbols ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]) showing on your dice.

name: Kylo Ren's Starfighter
text: [special] - Choose a color. Then reveal an opponent's hand and deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to them equal to the number of cards in their hand that match the chosen color.

name: Crystal Ball
text: After you activate attached character, you may look at the top card of a deck.

name: Force Rend
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Spend resources equal to the cost of a support or upgrade in play to discard it.

name: Maul's Lightsaber
text: Blue character only. Power Action - If an opponent has no shields on all of their characters, spend 1 resource to roll this die into your pool.

flavor: "Roger, Roger."

text: After you activate this character, if this die just rolled indirect damage ([indirect]), you may activate one of your other Battle Droids ([LEG]9).

flavor: "Face me!"
name: Kallus
subtitle: Agent of the Empire
text: Power Action - Turn this die showing ranged damage ([ranged]) to a side showing melee damage ([melee]), or vice versa.

flavor: "Ah, victory!"
name: Nute Gunray
subtitle: Separatist Viceroy
text: Each opponent gains 1 fewer resource during the upkeep phase, to a minimum of 1, unless that opponent discards the top 2 cards of their deck.

flavor: "Fear will keep the local systems in line."
name: Tarkin
subtitle: Grand Moff
text: Power Action - Remove 2 of your dice showing the same symbol to deal 4 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.

flavor: The elite soldier of the Imperial Military, trained for complete obedience to the command hierarchy, as well as the Galactic Emperor Palpatine.
name: Veteran Stormtrooper

flavor: A heavy transport starship used by the Trade Federation for transporting and deploying droid battalions planet side.
name: Separatist Landing Craft
text: [special] - Spend 2 resources to add a Battle Droid ([LEG]9) to your team. Discard this support from play.

flavor: Commonly used by the Galactic Empire's death troopers and coastal defender stormtroopers.
name: Fragmentation Grenade
text: After this die is resolved, discard this upgrade from play unless you spend 1 resource.

name: Grand Moff
text: Unique Red character only. Power Action - Use the "Claim" ability on the battlefield or switch the battlefield with a battlefield that is not being used (but was brought to the game).

name: Kallus' Bo-Rifle
text: Ambush.

flavor: "Nudd Chaa."
name: Bib Fortuna
subtitle: Majordomo
text: [special] - Roll a character die on one of your other characters into your pool.

flavor: "Don't get in my way."

subtitle: Deadly Mercenary
text: [special] - Deal damage to a character equal to the value showing on a die (yours or an opponent's).

name: Doctor Aphra
subtitle: Artifact Hunter
text: The cost of the first droid you play each round is decreased by 1. After you deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself, you may draw a card.

flavor: "Going somewhere, Solo?"
name: Greedo
subtitle: Unlucky Mercenary
text: Before this character is defeated, roll any number of his character dice into your pool. Then resolve any number of his character dice in the order of your choice.

name: Rebel Traitor
text: After you activate this character, you may force an opponent to activate one of their character as their next action this round, if able.

text: After you activate this support, activate up to 2 of your other supports in the order of your choice.

name: BT-1
text: After you activate this support, deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself. Then deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.

text: Power Action - Reroll one of your Yellow dice. Then you may remove an opponent's die showing a value equal to the value showing on the die you just rerolled.

text: [special] - Deal 1 damage to a character, or 2 damage instead if that character has 3 or more damage on it.

text:
Yellow character only.

text: [special] - Reroll an opponent's die. Reroll this die instead of removing it from your pool.

Blue character only.

name: Boss Nass
subtitle: Bombastic Ruler
text: After you activate a Gungan, you may deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to the number of its character dice that just rolled a blank ([blank]).

flavor: Though some regarded them as primitive, the amphibious Gungans were a technologically advanced species from the planet Naboo.
name: Gungan Warrior
Leia Organa
subtitle: Heart of the Resistance
text: Power Action - Remove one of your character dice to discard cards from the top of a deck equal to the value showing on that die.

flavor: "In my book, experience outranks everything."
name: Rex
subtitle: Clone Captain
text: Before you activate this character, you may spend 1 resource or spot a Clone Trooper to take control of the battlefield.

name: Blaze of Glory
text: Activate one of your characters. Then remove any number of an opponent's dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]) and deal damage to that character equal to the combined value of the removed dice.

name: Desperate Hour
text:
Play only if the combined remaining health of your characters is 3 or less.
Ready a character.

name: First Aid
text: Heal 2 damage from a Red character, or 4 damage instead if it is the first round of the game.

name: Gungan Offensive
text: Turn up to 3 of your Gungan or artillery dice to sides showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).

name: Motivate
text: Spot 2 Red characters or Leia Organa to resolve one of your character dice, increasing its value by 1.

name: Reposition
text: Force an opponent to turn a die to any side. Then you turn a different die to any side.

name: Long-Term Plan
text: Action - Exhaust this plot to place 1 resource on it or resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by the number of resources on this plot.

name: Gungan Catapult
text: After you activate a Gungan, you may reroll this die.

name: Resistance Crait Speeder
text: Before you resolve this die, if this support has no damage, you may place 1 damage on this support to increase its value by 1.

name: Suppressive Fire
text: After a character is activated, you may spend 1 resource and discard this support from play to remove one of its character dice.

name: Electropole
text: Before attached character would be defeated, you may move this upgrade to a Gungan (return this die to this card).

name: Inspiring Presence
text:
Unique character only.
Your other characters have the Guardian keyword.

name: Rex's Blaster Pistol
text:
While this upgrade is on Rex, your copies of it are non-unique.
After you activate attached character, if you control the battlefield, you may activate one of your characters.

flavor: "I've built a racer. It's the fastest ever!"
name: Anakin Skywalker
subtitle: Podracing Prodigy
text: After you activate this character, you may turn one of your droid or podracer dice to any side.

flavor: "You ever use one of these before?"
name: Bo-Katan Kryze
subtitle: Deathwatch Lieutenant
text:
You can include Yellow villain upgrades in your deck.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if this character has 1 or more villain upgrades.

flavor: "I've been in this fight since I was six years old."
name: Cassian Andor
subtitle: Rebellion Operative
text: After you resolve this die, you may deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent or discard the top card of a deck.

name: Trusted Informant
text: After you activate this character, you may look at an opponent's hand.

name: Clandestine Operation
text: Spot 2 Yellow characters or Cassian Andor to resolve any number of your dice showing the same symbol. Then discard cards from the top of a deck equal to the number of dice you just resolved.

name: Closing the Deal
text: Gain 5 resources. You must pass all of your future turns this round.

name: Defensive Racing
text: Play only if one or more of your vehicle dice were removed during an opponent's last turn this round. Spot a Yellow character to roll one of those removed dice into your pool.

name: Dumb Luck
text: Spot a Yellow character or a Gungan to reroll up to 5 of your dice. Then deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to the number of dice that just rolled a blank ([blank]).

name: Mechanical Insight
text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck for a droid or podracer, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Place the rest on the bottom of your deck in the order of your choice.

name: Narrow Escape
text:
Play only if you have no other cards in your hand.
Remove a die.

name: Rigged Detonation
text:
Play only if an opponent controls the battlefield.
Deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to that opponent equal to the number of resources they have, to a maximum of 5.

name: Righteous Cause
text: Ambush. Move 1 damage from one of your cards to another one of your cards in play of the same type (this ignores shields).

name: Scoping the Target
text: If you have 5 or more different symbols showing on your dice, deal 2 damage to a character or, if you have 10 or more different symbols showing on your dice, defeat a character.

name: Shootout
text: Turn up to 3 of an opponent's dice to sides showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]). Then turn an equal number of your dice to sides showing damage.

name: Anakin Skywalker's Podracer
text:
Ambush.
After you resolve this die, you may discard the top card of a deck or, if you spot Anakin Skywalker, discard a random card from an opponent's hand.

flavor: "The N-1 Starfighter represents the pinnacle in Naboo technology." <cite>Captain Quarsh Panaka</cite>
name: N-1 Starfighter
text: [special] - Ready or discard an exhausted vehicle that is not a copy of this support.

name: CR-2 Heavy Blaster
text: [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 4 damage instead if an opponent has no dice in their pool.

name: Stealthy
text: Attached character has the trooper subtype. [special] - Discard cards from the top of a deck equal to the value showing on one of your character dice.

name: Way of the Light
text: Remove a non-hero die.

flavor: The best food this side of the Senate District!
name: Dex's Diner
text: Action - Exhaust this support and spend 1 resource to heal 1 damage from a character, or 2 damage instead if there is 6 or more damage on that character.

name: Become One
text: Remove one of your Blue dice. Then resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by the value showing on the die you just removed.

name: Beguile
text: Reroll an opponent's die. Then turn one of their dice to any side. Then remove one of their dice.

flavor: "I have brought peace, freedom, justice, and security to my new empire." <cite>Darth Vader</cite>
name: Control
text: Turn all dice to sides of your choice.

name: Division in the Force
text: Resolve one of your Blue dice. Then remove a die showing the same value as the die you just resolved.

name: Flames of the Past
text: Discard a card from play if there is a copy of that card in any discard pile.

name: Peace and Quiet
text: Turn a die to a side showing a value of 0 <em>(blanks and specials have a value of 0)<em>.

name: Turn the Tide
text: Move all shields from an opponent's character to one of your characters.

name: Built to Last
text:
Each of your unique upgrades has the Redeploy keyword.
After you play a unique upgrade, you may exhaust this plot to gain 1 resource.

name: Honed Skills
text: Each of your characters can have one additional upgrade.

name: Dagger of Mortis
text:
Redeploy.
Before you resolve this die showing melee damage ([melee]), you may move 1 shield from a Blue character to attached character.

name: Force Jump
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Turn a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]) to a side showing a blank ([blank]). Reroll this die instead of removing it.

name: Way of the Force
text: Play only if you spot a Blue character. Attached character is elite (place a second copy of its die on it).

name: Change of Fate
text: Choose any number of dice. Force an opponent to turn each of those dice to sides of their choice.

name: Glancing Shot
text: Resolve one of your dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]), decreasing its value by 1. Then remove a die.

name: Grand Entrance
text: Activate one of your characters. Reroll any number of its character and upgrade dice. Then reroll any number of its character and upgrade dice.

name: Hostile Takeover
text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Choose a symbol showing on one of your dice. Then resolve an opponent's die showing that symbol as if it were your die.

name: Overload
text: Place 1 damage on a support in play. Then you may discard that support if it has damage on it equal to or more than its cost.

name: Reconstruct
text: Add a support from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Take the Fight to Them
text: Resolve any number of your dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]) in the order of your choice.

name: Home Turf Advantage
text:
Bring 2 battlefields to the game.
During setup, if your battlefield would be chosen for the game, you choose one of your 2 battlefields instead. Set the other one aside.

name: Ammo Reserves
text: After you play this support, place 3 damage on it. Action - Exhaust this support and remove 1 damage from it to deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.

flavor: This Aggressive ReConnaissance-170 starfighter was both armed for battle and equipped for deep-space travel.
name: ARC-170 Starfighter
text: Before this support is discarded from play, you may return it to its owner's hand.

name: Hailfire Droid Tank
text: After you play a vehicle (including this support), you may deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent. After you play a droid (including this support), you may activate it.

name: Weapon Master
text: Action - Remove one of attached character's character or upgrade dice to turn one of its weapon dice to any side.

name: Friend or Foe
text: Reroll a character die. Then, if it just rolled damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]), deal 1 damage to that character. Otherwise, give it 1 shield.

name: In The Crosshairs
text:
Ambush.
Choose a symbol. Then remove any number of dice showing that symbol.

name: Podracer Betting
text: Choose a number. Then reroll one of your vehicle dice. If that die just rolled a value equal to the number you chose, gain 2 resources, or 3 resources instead if it was a podracer die.

name: Reprogram
text: Choose a droid from your hand and play it, decreasing its cost by 1.

name: Risky Move
text: Spot a Yellow character to remove a die. The next card an opponent plays this round has the Ambush keyword.

name: Start Your Engines!
text: Search your deck for a podracer, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: Calling in Favors
text: Before you play an event that costs 3 or more, you may exhaust this plot to decrease its cost by 1, or by 2 instead if you have exactly one character in play.

name: Prized Goods
text: Action - Exhaust this support and one of your characters to place 3 resources on this support or to take all resources from it.

name: Streetwise
text: Before you play a Yellow event, you may exhaust this support to decrease its cost by 1.

name: XS Stock Light Freighter
text:
Ambush.
[special] - Place 2 resources on this support or take all resources from it. You may take one additional action.

name: Darksaber
text:
Redeploy.
Before you resolve this die, increase its value by 1 if attached character is 15 or more points, or by 2 instead if attached character is 20 or more points.

flavor: "Try them on, Grappling line, paralyzing darts, repulsor. All designed to combat the abilities of the Jedi". <cite>Fenn Rau</cite>
name: Mandalorian Vambraces
text: Action - Return this upgrade from play to its owner's hand.

flavor: "As my sweet mother always said, 'Son, if one hostage is good, two is better. And three, well, that's good business.'" <cite>Hondo Ohnaka</cite>
name: Respected Businessman
text: After you activate attached character, you may gain 1 resource.

name: V-1 Thermal Detonator
text: [special] - Discard this upgrade from play to deal 2 damage to each of an opponent's characters.

name: Extract
text: Choose up to 3 cards in a discard pile and set them aside.

name: Free Fall
text:
Ambush.
Force an opponent to remove one of their dice.

name: Made to Suffer
text: Each player discards cards from the top of their deck equal to the number of their dice showing a blank ([blank]).

name: Nature's Charm
text: Reroll up to 2 dice (yours and/or an opponent's).

name: Quell
text: Remove all of an opponent's dice showing indirect damage ([indirect]).

name: Under Attack
text: Remove any number of an opponent's dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]). Then deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself equal to the combined value showing on those dice.

name: Lotho Minor Junkers
text: [special] - Set aside a droid, equipment, vehicle, or weapon in your discard pile to gain 2 resources.

name: Podracer
text:
Ambush.
After this die rolls a blank ([blank]), return this support from play to its owner's hand.

name: Macrobinoculars
text: [special] - Look at an opponent's hand. Give a character 1 shield.

name: Boonta Eve Classic
text: After you resolve one of your podracer dice, you may place 1 resource on that podracer. If there are 4 or more resources on it, set each copy of this plot aside and gain 4 resources.

name: Arena of Death
subtitle: Nar Shaddaa
text: Claim - Deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to the number of defeated characters you have, to a maximum of 3.

name: Bendu's Lair
subtitle: Atollon
text: Power Action - Roll this die into your pool. After you take control of this battlefield, remove its die.

name: Comm Tower
subtitle: Scarif
text: Claim - Resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by 1 if you spot a plot.

name: Mos Espa Arena
subtitle: Tatooine
text: Claim - Force an opponent to choose to either lose 1 resource or have you gain 1 resource. Spot a podracer to force them to do both instead.

name: Rift Valley
subtitle: Dathomir
text: Claim - Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card's cost is an odd number, remove a die showing a value of 2 or less.

flavor: "There is no escape".
name: Darth Vader
subtitle: Terror To Behold
text: Power Action - If one or more of this character's character dice were removed during an opponent's last turn this round, discard a card from your hand to roll those dice into your pool.

flavor: "Doom is upon us."
name: Luce
subtitle: Callous Nightsister
text: Action - Discard a card from your hand that costs an odd number to reroll a die (yours or an opponent's).

flavor: "Pure warriors." <cite>Darth Maul</cite>
name: Nightbrother
text: After this die is rerolled by a card effect, you may discard the top 2 cards of your deck to resolve it, increasing its value by 1.

flavor: "Brother, I am an unworthy apprentice. I'm not like you. I never was."
name: Savage Opress
subtitle: Reckless Warrior
text: You must activate this character as your first action each round, if able, unless you spot Maul.

flavor: "I see the queen has given you a long leash." <cite>Count Dooku</cite>
name: Burst Of Lightning
text: Remove all shields from a character. For each shield just removed, you may remove a die.

name: Endow
text: Play any number of Blue upgrades from your hand on one of your Blue characters (paying each of their costs). Then roll each of those upgrades' dice into your pool.

flavor: "All I am surrounded by is fear. And dead men." <cite>Darth Vader</cite>
name: Fear and Dead Men
text: Resolve one of your dice showing melee damage ([melee]) for free against each of an opponent's characters.

name: I Am The Senate
text:
Play only if you have exactly one character in play.
For each die in your pool, you may remove a die showing the same value as that die.

name: Let The Hate Flow
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing a blank ([blank]).
Turn a die to a side showing a blank ([blank]).

name: Darth Vader's Meditation Chamber
text: Action - Exhaust this support to heal 1 damage from a Blue character and place 1 card from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck. Then spot Darth Vader to draw a card.

name: Galactic Deception
text:
Your opponents cannot give shields to characters.
After the action phase ends, discard this support from play.

flavor: "The senate has put a bounty on your horned little head." <cite>Asajj Ventress</cite>
name: Stifle
text: Before the effects of an opponent's event would be resolved, discard this support from play to cancel those effects instead.

name: Vader's Fist
text: After you play this support, you may roll this die into your pool. Power Action - Roll this die into your pool. Spot Darth Vader to turn this die to any side.

name: Bloodlust
text: After you resolve one of attached character's character dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]), you may deal 1 damage to a character.

name: Chain Sickle
text: After a character takes damage from this die, reroll any number of that character's character and upgrade dice.

name: Darth Vader's Lightsaber
text: After you resolve this die, you may spend 1 resource to roll one of attached character's character dice into your pool. Then, if this upgrade is on Darth Vader, deal 1 damage to a character.

flavor: "We don't like strangers." <cite>Nightsister</cite>
name: Energy Bow
text: After one of your card effects rerolls one or more character dice, you may reroll this die.

flavor: "Today, the Rebellion dies."
name: Iden Versio
subtitle: Inferno Squad Commander
text: While one or more of this character's character dice are in your pool, your opponents cannot take additional actions.

name: "Mauler" Mithel
subtitle: Vader's Wingman
text: After you activate this character, you may remove one of your vehicle dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]) to place that damage on a vehicle in play. Then discard that vehicle if it has damage on it equal to or more than its cost.

flavor: Due to the higher costs, super battle droids where often outnumbered on the battlefield by B1 battle droids 100 to 1.
name: Super Battle Droid
text: Power Action - Turn one of your droid character dice to a side showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).

flavor: "It is said that no traitor escapes the eye of Yularen for long." <cite>Yogar Lyste</cite>
name: Wullf Yularen
subtitle: ISB Colonel
text: Power Action - Look at a player's hand and choose a card from it. Discard that card if there is a copy of it in that player's discard pile.

flavor: "Your lightsabers will make a fine addition to my collection." <cite>General Grievous</cite>
name: Browbeat
text:
Play only if you have more dice in your pool than an opponent has in their pool.
Remove one of that opponent's dice.

name: Commence Primary Ignition
text: Activate one of your Red supports. Then you may resolve any number of its support and mod dice in the order of your choice, without removing them from your pool.

flavor: "I sense a trap." <cite>Obi-Wan Kenobi</cite>
name: Drop 'Em
text: Spot 2 Red characters to choose a weapon on up to 2 different characters. Return those weapons to their owner's hands.

flavor: "Don't worry about Higher Skies. Whatever is there, we'll find it." <cite>Wullf Yularen</cite>
name: Hatching A Plan
text: Turn a die to a side showing a discard ([discard]).

name: Imposing Presence
text: Remove an opponent's die if they have 3 or fewer cards in hand or remove 2 of an opponent's dice if they have no cards in hand.

name: In Tandem
text: Spot a Red character to turn any number of your vehicle dice that have the same title to the sides of your choice.

name: Questioned Loyalty
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing a discard ([discard]).
Name a card. Then look at an opponent's hand and discard each copy of the named card from it.

name: Reach The Stars
text:
Ambush.
Reroll up to 2 dice. Then, if you are fighting on your battlefield, reroll up to 2 dice.

flavor: "We'll have to destroy them ship to ship." <cite>Darth Vader</cite>
name: Black Two
text: While this die is showing ranged damage ([ranged]), increase its value by 1 if you spot "Mauler" Mithel.

name: TIE Fighter
text:
Ambush.
You may include up to 4 copies of this support in your deck.
After you play this support, search your deck for a copy of it, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: Umbaran Hover Tank
text: [special] - Deal 2 damage to each of an opponent's characters, or 3 damage instead if one or more mods are on this support.

flavor: "I still remember my last orders. The day the real war began." <cite>Iden Versio</cite>
name: Vigilance
text:
Your opponents cannot turn dice.
After the action phase ends, discard this support from play.

flavor: "VZ-626." <cite>Iden Versio</cite>
name: Inferno Squad ID10 Seeker Droid
text: [special] - Look at an opponent's hand and discard a card from it. That opponent may take one additional action during their next turn this round.

flavor: Underneath his mask of sophistication resided a brutality that manifested through the Crimson Dawn.
name: Dryden Vos
subtitle: Ruthless Crime Lord
text: [special] - Shuffle your deck and look at the top card of it. You may play that card for free.

flavor: "You in?"
name: Tobias Beckett
subtitle: Thief For Hire
text: Power Action - Each player gains 1 resource. [special] - Take 1 resource from an opponent. If that opponent has no resources, gain 1 resource.

name: Val
subtitle: Headstrong Renegade
text: [special] - Take 1 resource from an opponent. If that opponent has no resources, deal 2 damage to one of their characters.

name: Act Of Cruelty
text: Deal 1 unblockable damage to each of an opponent's damaged characters. Then discard a random card from that opponent's hand for each defeated character they have.

flavor: "Calm down, Artoo! It's just…" <cite>Luke Skywalker</cite>
name: Cunning Ruse
text: Reroll a character die. Then deal damage to that character equal to the value showing on that die.

name: Exploit
text:
Play only if an opponent has no resources.
Remove one of that opponent's dice.

flavor: "I saw this ship first, so I get first claim on anything in it!" <cite>Azmorigan</cite>
name: First Claim
text: Spot a Yellow character to gain resources equal to the cost of a support or an upgrade in play.

name: Heated Confrontation
text:
Ambush.
Resolve one of your dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]). Then force an opponent to resolve one of their dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).

name: In a Bind
text:
Force an opponent to choose 2
  • They remove 2 of their dice.
  • They discard 2 cards from their hand.
  • You deal 2 indirect damage ([indirect]) to them.

name: Shakedown
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing a disrupt ([disrupt]).
Remove a die showing a value of 2 or less.

name: Sidestep
text: Exhaust a support that costs 2 or less. Then you may deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself to exhaust another support that costs 2 or less.

name: Wanton Destruction
text: For each character die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]), deal damage equal to its value to its matching character.

name: Déjà Vu
text: After you play an event, you may exhaust this support to play that event from your discard pile (paying its cost). You cannot take more than one additional action this turn.

name: Firespray-31
text: Power Action - Play a mod from your hand on this support, if able, decreasing its cost by 2.

name: Relentless
text:
Your opponents cannot heal characters.
After the action phase ends, discard this support from play.

flavor: A weapon of choice for the Kanjiklub.
name: Donderbus Blaster Pistol
text:
Yellow character only. Redeploy.
After you play this upgrade, you may activate attached character.

flavor: The bounty hunter Latts Razzi wielded the triple scaled rows of a grappling boa.
name: Grappling Boa
text: After a character takes damage from this dice, you may remove one of that character's character dice.

name: Tobias Beckett's Rifle
text:
After you play this upgrade on Tobias Beckett, you may force an opponent to lose 1 resource.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to an opponent's character, or 3 damage instead if that opponent has no resources.

name: Vow Of Vengeance
text: Increase the value of each of attached character's character dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]) by 1 for each defeated character you have.

name: Retribution
text:
Include only if you have a character that is 20 or more points on your team.
After one or more of your character dice are removed by an opponent, you may deal 1 damage to a character.

flavor: "It pays for one to be prepared." <cite>Luminara Unduli</cite>
name: Barriss Offee
subtitle: Studious Padawan
text: After another character's character die is turned, you may turn one of this character's character dice to a side showing the same symbol as that die.

name: Force Mystic
text: Each Blue ability on this character has Redeploy. [special] - Roll a die on a Blue ability on this character into your pool.

flavor: "Revenge is not the Jedi way."
name: Kit Fisto
subtitle: Shii-cho Master
text: Before this character takes damage, you may remove one of his character or upgrade dice showing melee damage ([melee]) to block damage equal to the value showing on that die.

name: Qui-Gon Jinn
subtitle: Defiant Jedi Master
text:
While this character has 2 or more shields, increase the value of his character dice by 1.
While this character has 3 or more shields, increase the value of his upgrade dice by 1.

name: Bewilder
text: Spot a Blue character to reroll an opponent's character die. Then discard cards from the top of that opponent's deck equal to the value showing on that die.

name: Finishing Strike
text: Resolve one of your dice showing melee damage ([melee]) as unblockable. Then, if the character just dealt damage has 1 remaining health, defeat it.

name: Gathering Intelligence
text: Look at each opponent's hand. Look at the top card of each deck.

name: Hold Off
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing a shield ([shield]).
Remove a die showing melee damage ([melee]) or give a character 1 shield.

name: Insight
text: Draw 2 cards. Place 2 cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Into Exile
text:
Play only if you spot 2 ready characters.
Exhaust one of your characters. Then, until the end of the action phase, block all non-indirect damage dealt to that character by your opponents. Set this event aside.

name: Repulse
text: Choose 2 dice that are different colors. Then remove those dice.

name: Safeguard
text: Give a character shields equal to the number of upgrades on one of your characters.

name: Immutability
text:
Each of your upgrades has Redeploy.
After the action phase ends, discard this support from play.

name: Counterstroke
text:
Blue character only.
After an opponent deals damage to attached character, you may resolve this die, increasing its value by 1.

flavor: Before younglings are taught to construct a lightsaber, the must first prove themselves against a remote with only a wooden staff.
name: Lightsaber Training Staff
Pillio Star Compass
text: Power Action - Turn one of your dice to a side matching the symbol and value showing on this die.

name: Qui-Gon Jinn's Lightsaber
text: After 1 or more shields are removed from attached character, you may exhaust this upgrade to give that character 1 shield. Then, if this upgrade is on Qui-Gon Jinn, you may draw a card.

flavor: "They'll never stop us!"
name: Biggs Darklighter
subtitle: Rebellion Ace
text: After you activate this character, you may activate one of your vehicle supports. Then reroll any number of that vehicle's support and mod dice.

name: Clone Commander Cody
subtitle: Loyal Strategist
text:
While building your team, the point value of each Clone Trooper ([LEG]38) is decreased by 1.
[special] - Take control of the battlefield and use its claim ability or power action, even if it has been used this round.

flavor: "Rebellions are built on hope."
name: Jyn Erso
subtitle: Daring Infiltrator
text: After you activate this character, you may look at the top 3 cards of an opponent's deck, and rearrange them in any order. You may discard the top card of that deck.

name: Rebel Engineer
text: After you activate this character, you may look at the top 4 cards of your deck, reveal a mod from among them, and add it to your hand. Place the rest of those cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Aerial Advantage
text: Play only if you control the battlefield. Spot a Red character to turn a die to any side. You may spot a vehicle to remove a die. You may spot a mod to turn a die to any side or remove a die.

flavor: "I have to admit that without the clones it would not have been a victory." <cite>Obi-Wan Kenobi</cite>
name: Attack of The Clones
text: Ready any number of your non-unique characters that have the same title.

name: Dogfight
text: Exhaust an opponent's vehicle. Then you may ready a vehicle.

name: Evacuate
text: Defeat one of your non-unique characters. After the action phase ends, return that character to play.

name: Inflame
text:
Ambush.
Turn an opponent's die to a side showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).

name: Outgun
text: Spot any number of mods on your vehicles and spend that many resources to remove that many dice.

name: Turn The Tables
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing a focus ([focus]).
Remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]). Then turn up to 2 of your dice to sides showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).

name: Armed Escort
text:
Each of your characters has Guardian.
After the action phase ends, discard this support from play.

name: BB-8
text: Action - Spot a vehicle support to attach this card to it as a mod upgrade (discard all upgrades on this card). If that vehicle is Black One, ready it. Use this action only once per game.

name: Black One
text: Power Action - Spot Poe Dameron to turn this die to any side. [special] - Deal 1 damage to a character. If a droid is attached to this support, reroll this die instead of removing it.

name: X-Wing
text:
You can include up to 4 copies of this support in your deck.
The X on this die is equal to the number of copies of this support you have in play.

name: Jyn Erso's Blaster
text:
Redeploy.
After you activate attached character, you may reroll this die or discard the top card of a deck. If this upgrade is on Jyn Erso, reroll any number of her character dice.

name: R2 Astromech
text: Modify vehicle support. Action - Exhaust this upgrade and spend 2 resources to ready attached vehicle.

flavor: "Everything you heard about me is true."
name: Lando Calrissian
subtitle: Smooth and Sophisticated
text: Power Action - Play a Yellow vehicle from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1 and giving it Ambush. If that vehicle is the Millennium Falcon, you may activate it.

name: Leia Organa
subtitle: Boushh
text:
You can include up to 5 Yellow villain cards in your deck.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to each of an opponent's characters unless they give you 1 resource, or 2 resources instead if you spot a villain card.

name: L3-37
subtitle: Droid Revolutionary
text: Before this character is defeated, spot a vehicle support to attach this card to it as a 0 cost mod upgrade. If that vehicle is the Millennium Falcon, ready it. If this card would leave play as an upgrade, set it aside instead.

name: A Good Investment
text: Play only if you have one or more dice showing a resource ([resource]). Gain 4 resources, or 5 resources instead if you took 2 or more actions this turn (not this round).

name: Aid From Above
text:
Force an opponent to choose 2:
• You draw 2 cards.
• You gain 2 resources.
• You take 2 additional actions.

name: Daring Gambit
text: Reroll all of your dice. Then resolve one of your Yellow dice, increasing its value by the number of other dice in your pool. Remove all of your dice.

flavor: "We do it right, they won't even know we're there. Not until it's too late." <cite>Lando Calrissian</cite>
name: Drop In
text: Activate one of your characters or supports. If you are fighting on your battlefield, this event has Ambush.

name: Hijack
text: Spot a Yellow character to take control of an opponent's vehicle support that has no mods and ready it (return its die to its card). After the action phase ends, return that vehicle to its owner's control.

name: Karabast!
text:
Play only if an opponent has one or more dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).
Move up to 3 damage from one of your characters to another one of your characters.

name: Leverage
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).
Remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).

name: Reluctance
text:
Ambush.
Choose an opponent. That opponent cannot resolve more than one die during their next turn this round.

name: Slice And Dice
text: Remove 2 of your dice showing melee damage ([melee]). Then deal unblockable damage equal to the combined value showing on those dice to any number of characters, distributed as you wish.

name: Through The Pass
text: Activate one of your characters or supports. Then you may spend resources equal to the number of dice you just rolled to ready that character or support.

name: Escape Craft
text: Power Action - Spot the Millennium Falcon to attach this card to it as a mod upgrade (discard all upgrades on this card). Action - If this card is an upgrade, it becomes a support (do not ready it).

name: Millennium Falcon
text: After you play this support, you may search your deck or discard pile for Escape Craft ([AtG]102) and attach it to this support as a mod upgrade (without paying its cost). If you searched your deck, shuffle it.

name: On The Mark
text:
You may resolve the indirect damage ([indirect]) sides of your dice as ranged damage ([ranged]).
After the action phase ends, discard this support from play.

name: Decoy
text:
Yellow character only.
Before a character would be dealt damage, you may exhaust this upgrade to deal that damage to attached character instead.

name: Energy Pike
text: [special] - Deal damage to a character equal to the number of resources you have, to a maximum of 3.

name: Token Of Affection
text: After you play a card that has Ambush, you may move this upgrade to another one of your characters (return this die to its card).

name: At Odds
text: Remove a die showing a value that is an odd number. You may place this event on the bottom of your deck.

name: Common Cause
text: Spot any number of Blue characters to draw that many cards.

name: Conflicted
text: Reroll one of your Blue character dice. Then, if that die just rolled damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]), deal 2 damage to a character. Otherwise, give a character 2 shields.

name: Deadly Advance
text: Count the number of exhausted characters your opponents have. Turn up to that many of your dice to sides showing melee damage ([melee]).

name: No Questions Asked
text: Spot a Blue character and give an opponent up to 3 of your resources to remove that many dice. If you are fighting on your battlefield, draw that many cards.

name: Relinquish
text:
Ambush.
Return an upgrade you own in play to your hand.

name: You Were My Friend
text: Turn a character die to any side. If you have more Blue cards in play than an opponent, you may remove that die.

flavor: "Look what has become of you. A rat in the desert." <cite>Maul</cite>
name: Bitter Rivalry
text: After setup, choose an opponent. That opponent deals 2 unblockable damage to one of your characters and draws a card.

flavor: "Sense the future, once all Jedi could." <cite>Yoda</cite>
name: Foresight
text: Action - Exhaust this support to look at the top card of a deck. You may place that card on the bottom of that deck.

flavor: "It binds the galaxy together." <cite>Obi-Wan Kenobi</cite>
name: Nexus Of Power
text: After you activate this support, you may turn this die to any side.

name: Force Lift
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to a character or return a support in play that costs 3 or less to its owner's hand.

name: Shatterpoint
text: Blue character only. [special] - Discard an equipment or a weapon from play that costs equal to or less than the number of Blue ability dice in your pool (including this die).

name: Treasured Lightsaber
text:
After you play this upgrade, you may draw a card.
[special] - Deal 2 unblockable damage to a character, or 3 unblockable damage instead if you have 5 or more cards in your hand.

name: Attack Formation
text: Spot a Red character to resolve one of your non-character dice, increasing its value by the number of copies of that die in your pool (including that die).

name: Barrel Roll
text: Activate one of your supports. Reroll any number of its support and mod dice. Then reroll any number of its support and mod dice.

flavor: "Squadron up. Target Eadu." <cite>General Draven</cite>
name: Deployment
text: Activate any number of your supports and non-unique characters.

flavor: "Green Group, stick close to holding sector MV-7." <cite>Admiral Ackbar</cite>
name: Fleet Command
text: Spot any number of Red characters to reroll that many dice (yours and/or an opponent's).

name: Intense Fire
text: Resolve one of your dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]), increasing its value by 1, or by 2 instead if you have more Red cards in play than an opponent.

name: Revised Order
text: Turn a die to a side that has a value 1 higher than the value showing on it. If you control the battlefield, return this event to your hand.

name: Snuff Out
text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Remove all dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).

name: Transfer
text: Move a mod on one of your vehicle to another one of your vehicle supports.

name: Armored Reinforcement
text: Action - Set this plot aside to search your deck or discard pile for a Red vehicle support and play it, decreasing its cost by 1. If you search your deck, shuffle it.

flavor: Lined with 1,024 repulsorpods, the cavernous Senate Chamber was the meeting hall for the Galactic Senate.
name: Senate Chamber
text: Power Action - Remove one of your dice to turn a die to any side.

name: Dorsal Turret
text: Modify vehicle support. After you play this upgrade, you may roll this die into your pool.

flavor: The Alliance made sure to find a use for every weapon they could, from stun batons to repurposed TIE fighter cannons.
name: Handheld L-S1 Cannon
text: Attached character's upgrade limit is decreased by 1.

name: Triple Laser Turret
text: Modify vehicle support. While this die is in your pool, attached support's die cannot be removed by your opponents.

name: Han Solo
subtitle: Independent Hotshot
text: [special] - Deal 2 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent. You may reveal a villain card from your hand to force that opponents to lose 1 resource. You may reveal a hero card from your hand to gain 1 resource.

flavor: "We're doing this my way."
name: Qi'Ra
subtitle: Street Savvy
text: You can include Yellow hero and Yellow villain events in your deck.

name: Across The Galaxy
text: Spot a vehicle to switch the battlefield with a battlefield that was brought to the game. If you do not control the battlefield, gain 1 resource.

name: Cash Out
text:
Ambush.
Resolve any number of your dice showing a resource ([resource]).

flavor: "That was my best dissecting hand!" <cite>0-0-0</cite>
name: Dismantle
text: Spot a Yellow character and choose a support in play that has no mods. Then spend resources equal to that support's cost to discard it.

name: Fight Fire With Fire
text: Remove one of your dice showing indirect damage ([indirect]) to remove a die.

name: Indifferent
text: Spot a neutral character to remove a die.

name: Quick Thinking
text: Spot any number of Yellow characters to resolve that many of your Yellow dice in the order of your choice.

name: Shock Tactic
text:
Ambush.
Remove a non-unique die and all copies of it from each of your opponent's pools.

name: Double Down
text: You can include one additional copy of up to 2 different cards in your deck (following all other deckbuilding restrictions).

name: Improvised Defense
text: After a die is turned, you may discard this support from play to remove that die.

flavor: "I got the best weapons, best ship, and I'm feared across the galaxy." <cite>Ketsu Onyo</cite>
name: Shadow Caster
text: Decrease the resource cost on each side of this die by 1 for each mod on this support.

name: Arc Caster
text: Modify vehicle support. After you play this upgrade, you may activate attached support. Then you may reroll a die.

name: Black Sun Blaster Pistol
text:
While this upgrade is on a neutral character, it has Redeploy.
[special] - Deal 2 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent. Then deal 1 damage to a character.

name: Flame Projector
text: Yellow character only. Action - Resolve this die showing melee damage ([melee]) as indirect damage ([indirect]), incresing its value by 1.

name: Shriek
text: Remove all of an opponent's dice showing a value of 0 (blanks and specials have a value of 0).

name: T-16 Skyhopper
text: Ambush. This support can be activated. After you play this support, search your deck or discard pile for a mod and play it on this support, if able. If you searched your deck, shuffle it.

flavor: "Ever since the XP-38 came out, they just aren't in demand. - Luke Skywalker"
name: X-34 Landspeeder
text: This support can be activated. After you activate this support, you may reroll a die (yours or an opponent's).

name: Laser Cannon
text: Modify vehicle support. After you activate attached support, you may deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.

name: Systems Gauge
text: Modify vehicle support. After you activate attached support, you may spend 1 resource to remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).

name: Targeting Astromech
text: Modify vehicle support. Action - Exhaust this upgrade to turn attached support's die to any side.

name: No Allegiance
text:
Include only if you have no hero or villain characters on your team.
Each of your neutral characters has +1 health.

name: Solidarity
text: Include only if each character on your team is the same color and your deck contains no more than one copy of any card.

name: Landing Dock
subtitle: Scipio
text: After any player plays a vehicle, that player may take control of this battlefield. Power Action - Reroll a die.

name: Occupied City
subtitle: Lothal
text: After an opponent plays a support or an upgrade, you may discard the top card of their deck.

name: Theed Royal Palace
subtitle: Naboo
text: Power Action - Remove one of your dice to gain 1 resource. Spot a neutral character to take one additional action.

name: Training Room
subtitle: Kamino
text: Power Action - Reroll any number of your non-unique character dice.

name: Asajj Ventress
subtitle: Swift And Cunning
text: After a character that has a downgrade on it takes damage from this die, you may discard a card from your hand to remove one of that character's character or upgrade dice.

flavor: "Experience the full power of the dark side."
name: Palpatine
subtitle: Unlimited Power
text: This character has +1 health for each ability on it and those abilities do not count toward its upgrade limit. Power Action - Roll a die on an ability on this character into your pool.

flavor: Relayer of the order Operation: Cinder.
name: Sentinel Messenger
text: You cannot play Blue abilities on this character. After you activate this character, look at the top card of your deck. You may play that card (paying its cost).

flavor: Rumors thrived about her mysterious abilities.
name: Sly Moore
subtitle: Aide to the Emperor
text: After you activate this character, you may reroll one of your Sith dice. [special] - Turn a die to a side showing a blank ([blank]) and discard a random card from an opponent's hand.

name: Mind Extraction
text: Attached character loses all of its non-special ([special]) abilities. Action - Exhaust attached character to discard this downgrade. Only attached character's controller can use this action.

flavor: "It's not a story the Jedi would tell you. " <cite>Chancellor Palpatine</cite>
name: A Tale of Tragedy
text: Spot a Sith to turn another character's character dice to the sides of your choice.

name: Breaking Bonds
text: Choose a character and discard a downgrade from it. If that character is a Sith, you may turn a die to a side showing a blank ([blank]).

name: Fit of Rage
text: Remove all shields from all opponents' characters.

name: Forsaken
text:
Play only if a player has exactly one die in their pool.
Remove a die showing a value of 2 or less.

flavor: "You're so lonely... So afraid to leave..." <cite>Kylo Ren</cite>
name: Isolation
text: Spot a Blue character to remove a character die.

name: No Mercy
text: Discard any number of Blue cards from your hand. Then resolve one of your dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]), increasing its value by 1 for each card you discarded.

name: Forbidden Lore
text: Before you play a Blue ability, you may discard this support from play to decrease its cost by 1. Then you may spot a Sith to draw a card.

flavor: A self destruct mechanism was its fatal flaw
name: Imperialis
text:
After you activate Palpatine, you may activate this support.
[special] - Discard this support from play to deal 4 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.

name: Force Storm
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Exhaust this upgrade to place 1 resource on it. Deal damage to a character equal to the number of resources on this upgrade. Reroll this die instead of removing it.

name: Malice
text:
Redeploy.
[special] - Deal 1 damage to any number of characters that have one or more of their character dice showing a blank ([blank]).

name: Palpatine's Lightsaber
text: After you play this upgrade, gain resources equal to the number of ability upgrades on attached character, to a maximum of 2. While this upgrade is on Palpatine, your copies of it are non-unique.

name: Sith Teachings
text: Play only if you spot a Sith. After you play this upgrade, you may remove a die showing a blank. [special] - Deal 1 damage to a character, or 2 damage instead if you removed an opponent's die this round.

name: Captain Phasma
subtitle: Stormtrooper Commander
text: You may resolve your trooper dice showing damage as if they were melee damage ([melee]). Power Action - Roll 2 set-aside First Order Stormtrooper ([CONV]20) dice into your pool. Set those dice aside after they are resolved or removed.

flavor: "Those clankers have tough armor!" <cite>Clone Commander Cody</cite>
name: Commando Droid
text: After you activate this character, you may activate one of your droid characters or supports.

flavor: "A real stormtrooper has no room for sympathy. A real stormtrooper is the extension of the First Order, of Supreme Leader Snoke's will. Nothing less." <cite>Captain Phasma</cite>
name: First Order Stormtrooper

flavor: "Your screams are like music to my audio receptors!"
name: General Grievous
subtitle: Droid Armies Commander
text: While building your team, the point value of each droid is decreased by 1. Power Action - Reroll any number of your droid dice.

flavor: "The Techno Union Army is at your disposal."
name: Wat Tambor
subtitle: Techno Union Foreman
text: Power Action - Play a Red support from your hand (paying its cost). Then roll that support's die into your pool.

flavor: "KX-series droids are hardened against intrusion." <cite>Cassian Andor</cite>
name: A Sinister Peace
text: Discard a card from your hand to remove a die showing a value of 2 or more.

flavor: "It would seem once again one of your Order has lost his way." <cite>General Grievous</cite>
name: Make Demands
text: Spot a leader to choose an opponent's character and deal 2 damage to it unless they give you 1 of their resources.

name: Probe
text: Look at 2 random cards in an opponent's hand and discard each of those cards that is an event.

name: Pulverize
text: Resolve up to 3 of your dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]) in the order of your choice, increasing each of their values by 1.

flavor: "Get your head adjusted. It feels great."
name: Roger, Roger
text: Spot a Red character to turn up to 2 of your droid dice to the sides of your choice.

flavor: When you have overwhelming numbers, collateral damage is perfectly acceptable.
name: The Best Defense...
text: Deal one of your Red characters 3 damage to remove up to 2 of an opponent's dice.

flavor: When surrounded by war, one must eventually choose a side.
name: Defoliator Tank
text: [special] - Deal 3 damage to each character that is not a droid or General Grievous.

flavor: When a unit began to underperform, Emperor Palpatine would rectify the matter by sending in an enforcer.
name: Imperial Officer
text: After you activate this support, you may turn one of your trooper dice to any side.

name: Megablaster Troopers
text: After you activate this support, roll 1 set-aside First Order Stormtrooper ([CONV]20) die into your pool, or 2 First Order Stormtrooper dice instead if you spot a leader. Set those dice aside after they are resolved or removed.

flavor: The Single Trooper Aerial Platform was a lightweight repulsorcraft that greratly increased the speed and maneuverability of battle droids in the field.
name: Stap Droid
text: Ambush.

flavor: Droids could easily endure the excessive heat from its powerful bolts.
name: E-5 Blaster Carbine
text: While this upgrade is on a droid, it has Redeploy.

name: Modular Frame
text: Redeploy. Attached character has +1 health. Discard this upgrade from play if it is not on a droid or on General Grievous.

flavor: "I can't believe I'm getting paid for this!
name: Dengar
subtitle: Ruthless Tracker
text: After you activate this character, you may deal 1 damage to a character that has a bounty on it.

name: Jabba The Hutt
subtitle: Influential Kingpin
text: After you activate this character, you may look at the top 4 cards of your deck, reveal a bounty or a Yellow event from among them, and add it to your hand. Place the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

flavor: "These bounty hunters drive a more reasonable bargain than pirates." <cite>Cassiss</cite>
name: Quarren Tracker
text: [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character or deal 3 damage to a character that has a bounty on it.

flavor: "Mind tricks don't work on me. Only money."
name: Watto
subtitle: Stubborn Gambler
text: This character's character dice cannot be removed by opponents' Blue events. Power Action - Spend 1 resource and choose a symbol to reroll a die. If it rolls the chosen symbol, gain 2 resources.

flavor: "A death mark is not an easy thing to live with." <cite>General Rieekan</cite>
name: Death Mark
text: After attached character is defeated, you may draw 3 cards.

name: Enticing Reward
text: After attached character is defeated, you may play an equipment or a weapon from your hand or discard pile for free.

name: Barter With Blood
text: Each player hides any number of tokens from the supply in their hand, then reveals them. Each player who revealed the highest number of tokens is dealt that much indirect damage and may play a card from their hand for free.

name: Conveyex Robbery
text: Spot a scoundrel to choose one die in each opponents' pools. Resolve those dice in the order of your choice as if they were in your pool.

name: Exterminate
text: Each opponent chooses a character subtype. Then remove all opponents' character dice that do not have a chosen subtype.

name: Fight Dirty
text: Remove any number of your Yellow dice. Then deal damage to a character equal to the number of dice you just removed.

name: Hard Bargain
text: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. An opponent discards one of those cards, then you may play one of the other cards for free. Discard the remaining cards.

name: Hunt Them Down
text: Resolve one of your dice showing ranged or melee damage ([ranged] or [melee]) against a character, increasing its value by the number of bounty downgrades on that character.

name: Bounty Board
text: Action - Exhaust this support to search your deck for a bounty, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

flavor: It had no holding cells due to Dengar often taking only dead bounties.
name: Punishing One
text: After an opponent's character that has a bounty on it is defeated, you may ready this support. If you spot Dengar, you may activate this support.

flavor: "There will be no bargain." <cite>Jabba the Hutt</cite>
name: Crime Lord
text:
Yellow Character only.
[special] - Spend 5 resources to choose a character. Before this round ends, defeat that character.

name: Dengar's Fire Blade
text: After you play this upgrade, you may deal 1 damage to a character that has a bounty on it. Power Action - If this upgrade is on Dengar, turn one of his character dice to a side showing a value of 1.

flavor: "Pain delivered." <cite>Dengar</cite>
name: Skilled Tracker
text:
Yellow character only.
[special] - Remove a character die.

name: Separatist Conspiracy
text: Action - Exhaust this plot and spot any number of leader characters to draw that many cards, unless an opponent spends 1 resource or discards a card from their hand.

name: Assassin Droid
text: After you roll this die into your pool, you may deal 1 damage to a character.

flavor: "Looks like I got here just in time."
name: Ahsoka Tano
subtitle: Brash Prodigy
text: After you activate a Jedi, you may resolve one of this character's character or upgrade dice. If that die is showing a modifier, resolve it as if it did not have a modifier.

flavor: "Without the Jedi, there can be no balance in the force."
name: Lor San Tekka
subtitle: True Believer
text: Power Action - Choose 3 cards from your discard pile. Then an opponent adds one of those cards to your hand. Set the other 2 cards aside.

name: Mace Windu
subtitle: Inspiring Master
text: Power Action - Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may play an upgrade from among them. Place the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If that upgrade was played on a Jedi, give it 1 shield.

flavor: "It takes strength to resist the dark side. Only the weak embrace it."
name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
subtitle: Ardent Avenger
text: Power Action - Resolve one of your dice showing a value of 2 or more, increasing its value by 1.

flavor: When we rescue others, we rescue ourselves.
name: Vigilant Jedi
text: [special] - Remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]). Then deal 1 damage to a character.

flavor: "I've loved you always." <cite>Satine Kryze</cite>
name: A Friend Lost
text:
Play only if you have one or more defeated unique characters.
Turn up to 2 of your dice to sides showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).

name: Channel the Force
text: Reroll a die. You may spot a leader to turn a die to any side. You may spot a Jedi to remove a die.

flavor: The best armor is no match for a keen mind and quick feet.
name: Defensive Stance
text: Give a character 2 shields.

flavor: "Train yourself to let go of everything you fear to lose." <cite>Yoda</cite>
name: Disciplined Mind
text: Spot a Jedi to remove a non-Jedi die.

flavor: "I sense there's something here." <cite>Kit Fisto</cite>
name: Strong Intuition
text: Draw 3 cards, then discard a card from your hand.

name: Upper Hand
text: Play only if you have one or more dice showing a value of 2 or more. Remove a die showing a value of 0 (blanks and specials have a value of 0).

flavor: Buzz droids ravaged this interceptor during the Battle of Coruscant.
name: Obi-Wan Kenobi's Interceptor
text: After you activate this support, you may spot Obi-Wan Kenobi to turn one of your dice showing a blank ([blank]) to any side.

name: Uneti Force Tree
text: Action - Exhaust this support to choose another player. Then, you and that player each draw a card.

flavor: "We are what they grow beyond." <cite>Yoda</cite>
name: Yoda's Spirit
text:
Discard this support from play if you have Yoda in play.
