text: Ambush. Play a Red vehicle from your hand for free. After the upkeep phase begins, if that vehicle is in play, return it to its owner's hand.

name: Under Fire
text: Deal 1 damage to a Red character you control. Then remove a die.

name: Tactical Delay
text:
This support enters play with 2 resources on it.
After the action phase begins, remove 1 resource from this support. Then if no resources are on it, discard it to gain 2 actions.

name: Death Star Plans
text: Action - Exhaust this upgrade to place 1 resource on or remove 2 shields from your Death Star plot. After an opponent's effect deals damage to attached character, they may move this card to one of their characters.

flavor: "I don't think the maintenance teams even tested it once." <cite>Jessika Pava</cite>
name: Experimental Booster
text: Modify vehicle support. After this die rolles a blank ([blank]), discard attached vehicle unless it is piloted.

name: Licensed to Fly
text: Attached character gains pilot and has Piloting.

flavor: Nar Shaddaa was rife with criminals who coveted prized valuables, such as Luke Skywalker's lightsaber.
name: Nar Shaddaa Thief
text: Power Action - If this character is exhausted and an opponent has at least 2 more resources than you, take 1 resource from them.

name: Controlled Chaos
text: Choose a symbol. then reroll up to 5 dice. You may spend 1 resource to reroll any number of those dice again. For each of those dice showing the chosen symbol, deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.

name: Dangerous Escape
text: Discard all downgrades on a character. Then deal damage to that character equal to the number of downgrades discarded this way.

flavor: "I never ask for anything twice." <cite>Dryden Vos</cite>
name: Deadlock
text: Place 1 resource on a support you control. Place 1 resource on a support you do not control.

name: Monopolize
text:
Decrease the cost of this event by 1 for each opponent that has no resources.
Remove a die. Then if you have 3 or more resources, gain 1 resource.

name: Reap
text:
Ambush.
Turn one of your dice to a side showing a resource ([resource]).

name: Rogue Tendencies
text: Spot a scavenger to gain 1 resource. Spot a scoundrel to reroll up to 3 dice. Spot a bounty hunter to discard a random card from an opponent's hand.

flavor: The Jawaese language contains 27 words for "junk" and not a single one for "cowardice."
name: Survival Instinct
text: Give control of the battlefield to an opponent. Then remove a die showing a value of 2 or less.

flavor: If the electrified net didn't trap the quarry, it would surely slow them down.
name: Taken by Surprise
text: Deal 1 damage to a ready character or spot a mission plot to deal 2 damage to a diceless character.

flavor: You would be surprised how many problems a well-timed rocket can solve.
name: Think on Your Feet
text: Remove 1 resource from a non-plot card you control to remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]).

name: Coaxium Heist
text: Include only if you bring a set-aside Pyke Sentinel ([CM]40) to the game. After set-up, add that character to an opponent's team. Action - If no opponent controls a Pyke Sentinel, set this plot aside and remove 4 of your dice each showing different symbols to gain 10 resources.

flavor: The twin pods housed both a pilot and a gunner.
name: Cloud Car
text: Action - Play this vehicle for free from your hand. After the upkeep phase begins, give control of this support to an opponent.

flavor: Be careful who you hire.
name: Double Agent
text: After the upkeep phase begins, deal 2 indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself. Action - Discard an event from your hand to give control of this support to an opponent.

name: Improvised Explosive
text:
This support enters play with 2 resources on it.
After the action phase begins, remove 1 resource from this support. Then if no resources are on it, discard it to deal 3 indirect damage ([indirect]) to a player.

flavor: "I do love me a party." <cite>Weequay Pirate</cite>
name: Raiding Party
text: After you activate this support, you may remove 1 resource from a support or upgrade in play. Then gain 1 resource.

name: Repurposing
text: Action - Exhaust this support and set aside an equipment or weapon from an opponent's discard pile to play an equipment or weapon from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1.

name: Magna-Glove
text: [special] - Spend resources equal to the cost of an opponent's equipment or weapon upgrade in play to move it to attached character. Then spot a scavenger to roll that upgrade's die into your pool.

name: Z-6 Jetpack
text:
This upgrade enters play with 1 resource on it.
[special] - Place 1 resource on this upgrade. Then deal indirect damage to an opponent equal to the number of resources on this upgrade.

flavor: "Hey, what're you trying to push on us?" <cite>Owen Lars</cite>
name: Jawa Junk Dealer
text: After you activate this character, you may play a Gray neutral card from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1.

name: Outdated Tech
text: Modify opponent's vehicle support. Before attached vehicle's support die is resolved, you may reduce its value by 1.

name: Eject
text: Ambush. Discard a vehicle you control to heal 2 damage from one of its piloting characters and give that character 2 shields.

flavor: There's a fine line between haggling and swindling
name: Harmless Trick
text: Spot a Gray character to remove a die.

flavor: "Togu togu!"
name: Salvaged Parts
text: Set aside 2 non-event cards from a discard pile. Then spot a scavenger to gain 1 resource.

name: Standoff
text:
Ambush.
Give each character 1 shield.

name: Utinni!
text: Spot up to 4 Jawa characters to discard that many cards from the top of a deck.

name: Merchant Freighter
text:
This support enters play with 3 resources on it.
This support can be activated.
After you activate this support, you may remove 1 resource from it to gain 1 resource.

flavor: one of these mobile fortresses was large enough to contain an entire Jawa clan.
name: Sandcrawler
text:
This support enters play exhausted.
[special] - Discard the top 4 cards of your deck to add a set-aside Jawa Junk Dealer ([CM]147) to your team.

name: Wretched Hive
text: Action - Exhaust this support and spot a scavenger to force an opponent to choose and discard a card from their hand unless they give you 1 resource.

name: Abandoned Refinery
subtitle: Savereen
text: Power Action - Discard a support or upgrade you control to play a support or upgrade from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1. Then draw a card.

name: Colossus
subtitle: Castilon
text: After any player's character begins piloting a vehicle, that player may take control of this battlefield. After you take control of this battlefield, you may reroll a die.

name: Pyke Syndicate Mine
subtitle: Kessel
text: Claim - Discard the top card of a deck, or the top 2 cards instead if you spot a diceless character. If a non-event card is discarded this way, gain 1 resource.

name: Valley of the Dark Lords
subtitle: Moraband
text: Claim - Remove a non-character die.

name: Anakin Skywalker
subtitle: Reckless One
text:
Parallel die Anakin Skywalker ([CM]53).
After you activate this character, deal 1 damage to him and 2 damage to another character. Then, if that character was just defeated, flip this character.

name: Darth Vader
subtitle: Driven By Anger
text: Parallel die Darth Vader ([AW]10). Power Action - Either remove all shields from a character, or resolve one of your dice as melee damage, increasing its value by 1. If an opponent has a defeated character, you may do both in any order.

name: Luke Skywalker
subtitle: Seeking The Path
text:
Parallel die Luke Skywalker ([LEG]31).
Team Up 1: Obi-Wan Kenobi, Yoda.
After the upkeep phase begins, if this character has 3 or more shields and 3 or more Blue upgrades with dice, you may spend 2 resources to flip him.

name: Luke Skywalker
subtitle: Fulfilling His Destiny
text: Parallel die Luke Skywalker ([AW]35). Power Action - Either give this character 2 shields, or remove 2 shields from him to deal 2 damage to a character. If this character has 3 or more Blue upgrades, you may do both in any order.

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
subtitle: Wise Protector
text: Guardian. After this character is defeated, return him to play flipped and ready. Action - Spot another Blue character to remove a die showing damage. Defeat this character and, if he is elite, remove up to 3 dice.

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi's Spirit
text: Parallel die One With the Force ([AW]42). If this support would leave play, set it aside instead. Power Action - Give a Blue character 1 shield and reroll any number of its character and upgrade dice.

name: Sweeper Droid Infiltration
text: After setup, if this plot is elite, add an additional copy of it to your team. Action - Play an event from your hand to reroll a die. Then flip this plot.

name: Demolition Droid
text: Action - Play a non-event card from your hand to deal 1 indirect damage to an opponent. If 2 or more bomb plots are in play, you may set them all aside and deal 4 indirect damage to an opponent. If you do not, flip this plot.

name: Send in the Troopers
text: Action - If you control the battlefield and 5 or more dice in your pool are showing damage, force an opponent to name a character. Then flip this plot. If they did not name this character, make it elite.

name: Arc Trooper Echo
subtitle: Courageous and Resolute
text: After you activate this character, if it is elite, you may roll a character die on a character into its controler's pool. If you control the battlefield, you may roll a character die on a character into its controller's pool.

name: Arc Trooper Fives
subtitle: ARC-5555
text:
After you activate this character, roll a Clone Trooper ([LEG]38) die into your pool, or 2 Clone Trooper dice instead if this character is elite.
After a Clone Trooper die is rolled into your pool, you may reroll it. If you control the battlefield, you may reroll it again.

name: Clone Commander Wolffe
subtitle: Staunch Strategist
text: After you activate this character, you may roll a Clone Trooper ([LEG]38) die into your pool and activate one of your Red characters. If this character is elite and you control the battlefield, spot any number of unique Red characters to deal that much indirect damage to an opponent.

name: Closing In
text: Team Up 1: Each unique bounty hunter. After you deal melee or ranged damage to a character with a bounty on it, you may exhaust this plot and flip it to attach it to that character.

name: Captured
text: If this downgrade would leave play, set it aside instead. Attached character cannot be activated. Action - Give the player that controls this downgrade 1 resource to flip it. Any player may use this ability.

name: Rescue Han Solo
text: Team Up 1: Chewbacca, Lando Calrissian, Leia Organa, Luke Skywalker. Action - Play a card from your hand with a cost equal to the number of resources on this plot. Its cost cannot be decreased. Then place 1 resource on this plot and if it has 5 resources, flip it and exhaust it.

name: Han Solo
subtitle: Cool and Confident
text:
Piloting. Parallel die Han Solo ([AW]46).
After you activate this character, remove 1 resource from him to gain 1 resource.
After this character is defeated, lose all of your resources. Each opponent gains that many resources.

name: Choose Your Destiny
text:
Infinite format only. Choose 3 sets. You can only include other cards on your team and in your deck from those sets.
After you play a card, if you played cards from all 3 sets this round, flip this plot.

name: I Will Not Turn
text:
Your dice cannot be turned by opponents.
Before the round ends, gain 1 resource.
After an opponent plays a card, if they played cards from 3 different sets this round, flip this plot.

name: United
text:
Include only if each character on your team is the same color.
After an opponent removes one of your dice, you may roll it into your pool. Then set this plot aside, or if it's elite, flip it instead.

name: We Stand
text: After an opponent removes one of your character dice, you may spend 2 resources and discard 2 cards from your hand to ready that character. Then set this plot aside.

name: Mortis (Day)
subtitle: Ethereal Space
text: After the upkeep phase begins, heal 1 damage from each character. Flip this card. Claim - Heal 1 damage from a character. You may flip this card.

name: Mortis (Night)
subtitle: Ethereal Space
text: After the upkeep phase begins, deal 1 damage to each character. Flip this card. Claim - Deal 1 damage to a character. You may flip this card.

name: Ninth Sister
subtitle: Brutish Empath
text: [special] - Deal 3 damage to an opponent's character unless they discard 1 card from their hand, or 2 cards instead if that character has no shields.

name: Purge Trooper
text: You cannot play Blue abilities on this character. Before resolving this die, if this character has an upgrade on it, you may remove 1 shield from a character.

name: Second Sister
subtitle: Expert Duelist
text:
After you activate this character, turn an opponent's die to a symbol showing on one of this character's character dice
[special] - Turn another one of your character dice to any side and resolve it, increasing its value by 1, or by 2 instead if it is showing the same symbol as an opponent's die.

name: Taron Malicos
subtitle: Fallen Master
text: After you activate this character, if there are no dice showing shields in play, you may spend 1 resource to deal 2 damage to a character. Power Action - Spot up to two other Blue characters to turn that many of an opponent's dice to any side.

name: Peace Is a Lie
text: Play only if all of your characters in play are Blue. Spot a Sith or Inquisitor to remove all shields from all characters.

name: Siphoning Anger
text: Turn one of your dice to a side showing a blank. Then, if an opponent has two or more dice showing a blank, gain 1 resource.

name: Unending Hate
text: Spot a Sith or Inquisitor to turn an opponent's die to a side showing a blank. Then deal damage to a character equal to the number of dice in that opponent's pool showing a blank, to a maximum of 2.

name: Vicious Rebuttal
text: Choose an opponent's die showing damage. That opponent may resolve it for free without removing it from their pool. You may resolve that die.

name: The Inquisitorius
text: Include only if each character on your team is an Inquisitor. Action - Exhaust this plot to turn an opponent's character die to a side showing a blank.

name: Painful Lessons
text: After you play this support, spot any number of Blue characters to place that much damage on this support. Action - Move 1 damage from this support to one of your Blue characters to reroll a die.

name: Inquisitor Lightsaber
text: After this die rolls a blank, if this upgrade is on an Inquisitor, you may exhaust this upgrade to reroll it. Action - Discard a card to reroll this die. Any player may use this action.

name: Sith Warblade
text:
Redeploy.
Before you resolve this die, deal 1 damage to attached character.

name: Taron's Lightsaber
text:
While this upgrade is on Taron Malicos, your copies of it are non-unique.
After you play this upgrade, remove all shields from a character. If 3 or more shields are removed this way, deal 1 damage to that character.

name: ISB Agent
text:
Detect.
Before an opponent discards a card from hand, if it is not detected, you may force them to switch that card with one of their detected cards, if able (the detected card will be discarded).

name: FN-2199
subtitle: Fierce Fighter
text: After setup, you may look at the top 4 cards of your deck, reveal a weapon from among them, and add it to your hand. Power Action - Roll a die on a weapon on this character into your pool and resolve it if able. Otherwise, remove it.

name: Exposing Disloyalty
text: Look at 2 random cards in an opponent's hand. Then, if those cards do not share a color, discard one of them.

name: Extermination Order
text: Spot a Red trooper to deal 3 indirect damage to an opponent. Then spot a Red leader to gain 2 resources.

name: Raze
text: Spot a Red character to discard an exhausted support or upgrade from play. Then deal indirect damage to its controller equal to half its cost rounded down.

name: TIE Striker
text: Action - If an opponent activated a vehicle during their last turn this round, you may discard another card from your hand to play this vehicle from your hand for free. After the upkeep phase begins, discard this support from play unless you discard the top 4 cards of your deck.

name: FN-2199's Riot Baton
text: After attached trooper character takes damage, you may exhaust this upgrade to roll this die into your pool and resolve it, if able. Otherwise, remove it. [special] - Deal 3 damage to a non-unique character or remove a unique character's character or upgrade die.

name: Bala Tik
subtitle: Reclaiming Debts
text:
Detect.
After the battlefield is claimed, you may give this character shields equal to the number of detected cards in an opponent's hand.

name: Bazine Netal
subtitle: First Order Informant
text: Detect. After an opponent plays a detected card, you may deal 1 damage to a character. Power Action - Remove this die showing a resource to place or remove up to 2 resources on a non-character card.

name: Bing
subtitle: Cybernetic Killer
text:
Detect.
Before you resolve this die showing damage, you may increase its value by one for each detected card in an opponent's hand.
After you activate this character, if an opponent has two or more detected cards in their hand, gain 1 action.

name: Haxion Brood Droid
text: Power Action - Deal 1 damage to another Haxion Brood Droid to resolve one of this character's character dice for free.

name: Extort Cooperation
text: When you resolve this die showing a resource, place those resources on this downgrade instead of gaining them. Action - Remove a number of resources equal to the point value of attached character from this downgrade and discard it to take control of attached character.

name: Booby Trap
text: Discard a detected card to deal indirect damage equal to its cost to that card's owner.

name: Bounty Averted
text: Spot a bounty hunter and discard any number of bounties from an opponent's character. Then remove that number of that character's character or upgrade dice.

name: Rotten Deal
text: Force an opponent to look at the top 2 cards of their deck, then reveal one of them. You may play either of those two cards for free. Then the opponent may play the remaining card for free.

name: Kyuzo Petar
text: If attached character is Yellow, you may resolve this die as if it did not have a modifier.

name: Discord
text: Spot two characters that share a color and deal 1 unblockable damage to each of them to choose up to 2 of your dice. Then turn each of those dice to sides showing a different symbol than each other. You must pass on your next turn this round.

name: Cal Kestis
subtitle: Jedi in Hiding
text: You cannot play non-Blue upgrades on this character. Before you resolve this die, increase its value by 1 if you have an equipment, weapon and ability attached to this character.

name: Sifo-Dyas
subtitle: Foreseer of War
text: After you activate this character, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it is Blue, you may draw it. Otherwise, discard it.

name: Apt Lesson
text: Turn one of your Blue character dice to any side. Then you may play a move event from your hand or discard pile.

name: Protect the Younglings
text: Remove one of your Jedi character dice to give one of your apprentice characters 3 shields.

name: Pursuit of Perfection
text: Play only if you spot a Jedi. This support enters play exhausted. Action - Exhaust this support, discard it, and remove any number of shields from your characters to resolve that many of your Blue dice in any order.

name: BD-1
text: Power Action - Spot a Jedi character to move this upgrade to it. [special] - Heal 2 damage from attached character

name: Cal Kestis' Lightsaber
text: Power Action - If this upgrade is on Cal Kestis, turn this die to any side. If this die is showing a non-damage side, you may roll a set-aside copy of this die into your pool. Set that die aside after it is resolved or removed.

name: Force Repulse
text: Jedi character only. [special] - Turn each other character's character dice to sides showing a blank. Then, for each die turned, deal 1 damage to its matching character.

name: Jaro Tapal's Lightsaber
text: Discard this upgrade from play if you control Cal Kestis' Lightsaber. While this upgrade is on Jaro Tapal, it has redeploy. Power Action - Discard this upgrade from play to play Cal Kestis' Lightsaber from your hand on attached character for free.

name: Cassian Andor
subtitle: Efficient Agent
text: Detect. You can include up to 4 different intel cards in your deck, ignoring affiliation and color. Power Action - Play a Yellow card from your hand. Then you may spot a leader to ready a non-character card.

name: Galen Erso
subtitle: Conscripted Physicist
text: Detect. After an opponent chooses to discard a detected card, you may gain 1 resource. Action - Defeat this character to exhaust a character or support.

name: Jyn Erso
subtitle: Rebellion Operative
text: Detect. Detected cards cannot be played by opponents. Power Action - Discard a card from your hand to discard a detected card from an opponent's hand.

name: Medic!
text:
Ambush.
Spot any number of Red characters to heal that much damage from a character.

name: Rebel Schemes
text: Activate a character you control with detect. Then, instead of triggering their detect, reveal an opponent's hand and choose a card from it. That card remains revealed until the end of the action phase. (It is detected)

name: Secret Mission
text: Draw cards equal to the number of detected cards in an opponent's hand. Then, if you drew 1 or more cards, set-aside a card from your hand facedown. For the rest of the game, you may play that card as if it were in your hand.

name: Cassian's Blaster
text: Redeploy. Action - Resolve this die showing ranged damage, increasing its value by 1. If this upgrade is on Cassian Andor, that damage is unblockable.

name: Jyn Erso's Blaster
text:
Red character only.
After you play this upgrade choose and do 1, or choose 2 if this upgrade is on Jyn Erso:
- Roll this die into your pool.
- Resolve one of your dice.
- Activate a character.

name: Master of Disguise
text: Spy character only. After you play this upgrade, choose a character in play. Attached character gains the subtypes of the chosen character. [special] - Resolve a character die that shares a subtype with the attached character.

name: Babu Frik
subtitle: Master Droidsmith
text: This character cannot be dealt melee or ranged damage from vehicle dice. Power Action - Discard a card from your hand to either turn a droid die to any side, or play a droid from any discard pile decreasing its cost by 1.

name: Greez Dritus
subtitle: Cantankerous Pilot
text:
Piloting.
After you activate this character, choose a number. Reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card's cost is the same as the number chosen, turn up to two of your dice to any side. Otherwise, force an opponent to remove one of your dice.

name: Rebel Partisan
text: After the last card in your hand is discarded, discard the top card of your deck to deal 1 indirect damage to an opponent.

name: Saw Gerrera
subtitle: Ruthless Extremist
text: After this die is rolled or turned during the action phase, if this character is elite, deal 1 indirect damage to yourself.

name: Change of Plans
text: Play only if all of your characters in play are Yellow. Resolve one of your Yellow support dice as if it was showing a different symbol

name: Explosive Cocktail
text: Resolve one of your dice showing indirect damage to remove a die.

name: Hey Hey!
text: Spend any number of resources. Then spot an engineer to resolve one of your support dice, increasing its value by the number of resources you just spent.

name: Reckless Ambush
text: Spot a scoundrel or partisan to deal 2 indirect damage to yourself and remove a non-character die.

name: Scrounging Parts
text: Spot any number of engineers to gain that many resources. Reveal your hand.

name: Stinger Mantis
text: After you exhaust this support, you may discard a card from your had to draw a card. Power Action - Exhaust this support to force an opponent to lose 1 resource, or 2 resources instead if you have fewer characters in play than that opponent.

name: DL-18 Blaster
text: You may resolve the ranged sides [ranged] of this die as if they were a modifier with no resource cost.

name: Saw's RPS-6 Rocket Launcher
text: This die cannot modify other dice. Power Action - Resolve this die against yourself, as if it were not showing a modifier. Then deal indirect damage to an opponent equal to the number of damaged characters you can spot plus 1.

name: Unity
text: Spot two characters that share a color to remove a die. Then gain 1 resource.

name: Intelligence Operation
text: Include only if each character on your team is a spy. This card does not ready during the upkeep phase. Action - Exhaust this plot to play a detected card.

name: Merrin
subtitle: Nightsister Survivor
text: You may include Blue villain curses in your deck. After setup, add a set-aside Nightsister Zombie ([SoH] 4) to your team. Power Action - Exhaust an opponent's character with a curse attached to it. Then roll that character's character and upgrade dice into their pool.

name: Force Affinity
text: Spot up to 2 apprentice, Sith, or Jedi characters to draw that many cards. Spot a Jedi to gain 1 resource. Spot a Sith to deal 1 damage to a character.

name: Form Drills
text: Choose 2 different set-aside move events, reveal them, and shuffle them into your deck.

name: Sarlaac Sweep
text: Remove one of your character or upgrade dice showing damage to deal damage equal to half its value rounded up to two characters. Return this card to your hand if that character has an upgrade titled Shii-Cho Mastery on it.

name: Will of the Force
text: Resolve one of your dice showing a shield without removing it from your pool. Then resolve that die again. Spot a card with the word Mastery in its title to gain 1 resource.

name: Prescient Leap
text: After you resolve 2 or more Blue dice in the same action, you may place 1 resource on this card. Action - Discard this support to discard an opponent's upgrade or downgrade with a cost less than or equal to the number of resources on this support.

name: Shii-Cho Mastery
text: Blue character only. Limit 1 form per character. After you play this upgrade, you may spend 2 resources to discard a weapon from play. [special] - Turn a die showing damage to a side not showing damage. Then turn a die to a side showing melee damage.

name: Shii-Cho Training
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Turn a die showing damage to a side not showing damage. You may discard this upgrade to play a card titled Shii-Cho Mastery from your hand or discard pile on attached character for free.

name: Planned Operation
text: Spot a Red character to heal 2 damage from a character. Spot 2 Red characters to turn a die to any side. Spot 3 Red characters to resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by 1.

name: Kamino Cloning Facility
text: After you resolve a Red die, you may place 1 resource on this support. Action - If this support has 11 or more resources on it, discard it and spend 2 resources to add a set-aside non-unique trooper character that matches your team's affiliation to your team.

name: Tactical Advantage
text: After an opponent takes an action, if you have claimed the battlefield this round, you may set this support aside to gain 1 action that you can take even if you would otherwise be forced to decline.

name: Proton Bombs
text: Modify vehicle support. After this die is resolved, place 1 damage on this upgrade. Discard this upgrade from play if it has 2 or more damage on it.

name: R3 Astromech
text: Modify vehicle support. Action - Exhaust this upgrade and spend 1 resource to add or remove a token on the attached support or on one of the attached support's upgrades. (Damage tokens are always added/removed in increments of 1 damage)

name: Burned
text: Before this downgrade enters play, any player may spend 2 resources to discard it instead. Discard all titles attached to attached character.

name: Tailed
text: After attached character is activated, force its controller to choose one of attached character's character dice. Then you may spot an exhausted character or discard this downgrade to turn that die to any side.

name: Demand Tribute
text: Spot a scoundrel to discard a random card from an opponent's hand for each color among characters they control.

name: Faltering Allegiances
text: Deal 1 damage to a Blue character. Deal 1 damage to a Red character. Deal 1 damage to a Yellow character.

name: Forewarned
text: Remove a die showing a value less than the cost of a detected card in an opponent's hand.

name: Selling Intel
text: Choose a detected card in an opponent's hand to gain 1 resource, or 2 resources instead if the chosen card's cost is 3 or more. The chosen card is undetected.

name: Trash to Treasure
text: Play a weapon upgrade or vehicle support from an opponent's discard pile, decreasing its cost by 1 for each Yellow character you can spot.

name: Extremist Campaign
text:
You can only include Yellow characters on your team.
During setup, you lose the starting character roll.
After setup, lose the game unless you shuffle 2 set-aside copies each of Disable ([EaW] 137), Rebel ([SoR] 112), and Act of Cruelty ([AtG] 38) into your deck.

name: Incendiary Stockpile
text: You can resolve your Yellow dice showing resources or disrupt as melee damage against this support, placing damage on this card equal to the damage dealt. Action - Discard this support to deal indirect damage to an opponent equal to the amount of damage on it.

name: Sliced Terminal
text: Before an opponent's card would be resolved after being played, you may discard this support from play to discard that card instead. Then that opponent may play a card from hand for free.

name: Vibrosword
text:
Redeploy.
Decrease the cost of this upgrade by 1 if you play it on a Yellow character. Before you resolve this die, increase its value by 1 if attached character is unique and increase its value by 1 if attached character is elite.

name: Restraining Bolt
text: Modify opponent's droid character or support. The attached character or support's dice cannot be turned.

name: Sneaky Diversion
text: Choose a detected card to switch it with the top card of its owner's deck. (The card from the deck inherits the effect from detect when switched and will be detected)

name: Pirate Slugthrower
text:
Redeploy.
This upgrade cannot be discarded from play. Decrease the cost of this upgrade by 1 for each character you can spot that shares a color

name: Stolen Datapad
text: Spy or scoundrel character only. Before one of your dice would be removed by an opponent, discard this upgrade to have that die not be removed instead.

name: Darth Zannah
subtitle: Student of the Sith
text: After you activate this character, deal 1 damage to another Sith you control to roll a character die on it into your pool. After a Sith character you control is defeated, this character gains their dice and Sith for the rest of the game.

name: Kylo Ren
subtitle: Driven by Fear
text:
Before drawing your starting hand, you may shuffle 2 copies each of Feel Your Anger ([AW]82) and Anger ([SoR]71) into your deck.
After you activate this character, deal 2 indirect damage to an opponent. Force that opponent to turn this character's character dice to sides of their choice.

name: Maul
subtitle: Consumed by Revenge
text: After you play an event, place 1 resource on this card. If this character has 7 or more resources on it, you may spend 2 resources to flip this card.

name: Maul
subtitle: Conqueror of Mandalore
text: After you play an event, place 1 resource on this card. Power Action - Play a Blue event with an even cost from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1. [special] - Gain 2 resources or resolve any die. If this character has 7 or more resources on it, you may do both in any order.

name: Savage Opress
subtitle: Loyal Sibling
text: Team Up 1: Maul. Guardian. Power Action - Discard a card from your hand and spend 3 resources. Then flip this character.

flavor: "Brother, I am an unworthy apprentice."
name: Savage Opress
subtitle: Dark Acolyte
text:
Guardian.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to a character or turn a die to a side showing a value of 0. If this character has 6 or more damage, you may do both in any order.

name: Tenth Brother
subtitle: Tested by the Force
text: [special] - Use a special ability on another card in play (yours or an opponent's).

name: The Haunted
text: Play only if you spot a witch. After attached character is defeated, add a set-aside Nightsister Zombie ([SoH]4) to your team.

name: Chant of Resurrection
text: Exhaust one of your witch characters to add 3 set-aside Nightsister Zombies ([SoH]4) to your team. After the action phase ends, defeat those Nightsister Zombies.

name: Force Drain
text:
Before you play this event, decrease its cost by 1 if an opponent's character has a downgrade on it.
Exhaust one of your Blue characters to deal 3 damage to an opponent's character. Then, if that character is defeated, heal 5 damage from one of your Blue characters.

name: Your Powers Are Weak
text: Spot an Inquisitor or Sith to choose a symbol. Reroll up to 3 of an opponent's dice. For each of those dice showing the chosen symbol, remove it. Otherwise, turn it to a side showing a blank.

name: Watch Your Career With Great Interest
text: After you turn or remove a die, place 1 resource on this plot. Action - Defeat one of your Sith or apprentice characters and remove 6 resources from this plot. Then, if the defeated character was elite, this plot becomes elite. Flip this plot.

name: Darth Vader
subtitle: Unrelenting Apprentice
text: [special] - Play an ability from your hand or discard pile, decreasing its cost by 2. Then roll that ability's die into your pool.

name: Interrogation Chair
text: Action - Spot an Inquisitor and exhaust this support to choose an opponent's character die. Then deal 2 indirect damage to that opponent unless they resolve that die.

name: Nightsister Assassins
text: Play only if you spot a witch. After you play this card, you may deal 1 damage to a character with a curse on it.

flavor: "General, prepare your troops for a surface attack." <cite>Darth Vader</cite>
name: General Veers
subtitle: Death Squadron General
text: After the start of the first round of the game, you may spend 2 resources to add a set-aside Snowtrooper ([RM]15) to your team. Power Action - Take control of the battlefield.

flavor: "He is as clumsy as he is stupid." <cite>Darth Vader</cite>
name: Kendal Ozzel
subtitle: Bumbling Tactician
text: Before the starting character roll, each opponent may choose to lose the starting character roll to give 2 shields to their characters, distributed as they wish.

flavor: The elite snowtroopers of the Galactic Empire are trained and equipped to operate in frigid environments.
name: Snowtrooper
text: While you are fighting on Hoth, this character has +1 health.

name: Tseebo
subtitle: Spectre Sympathizer
text:
Detect.
After this character's Detect ability detects a hero card, give an opponent's character two shields.

name: Enfilading Fire
text: Spend up to 2 resources to resolve that many of your non-unique Red character dice showing damage against each of an opponent's characters.

name: Offensive Position
text: If an opponent removed one of your Red dice during their last turn, roll it into your pool. Take control of the battlefield.

name: Reckless Charge
text: Choose any number of your non-unique Red characters and deal 3 damage to each of them. Ready those characters.

name: Salvage the Assault
text: Exhaust 2 of your non-unique Red characters. Then gain 2 resources.

name: Relentless Advance
text: Team Up 1: Each trooper, General Veers. At the end of the round or when you take control of the battlefield, place 1 damage on this plot. Action - Remove any amount of damage on this plot to deal that much indirect damage to an opponent.

name: 501st Assault Team
text:
This support can be activated.
After you activate this support, you may play a set-aside E-Web Emplacement ([SoR]5) for free. You may take control of the battlefield or give control of the battlefield to an opponent.

name: Blizzard 1
text:
This card's cost cannot be decreased.
After you activate this support, you may roll a set-aside copy of this die into your pool. Set that die aside after it is resolved or removed.

name: XJ9-CS14
text: [special] - Switch the battlefield with a set-aside battlefield and give control of it to an opponent.

name: Electrohammer
text: After this die deals damage to a character, you may remove one of that character's character or upgrade dice.

name: Garindan
subtitle: Information Trader
text:
Detect.
After a detected card leaves any player's hand, you may draw a card.
[special] - Choose a card in any player's discard pile and roll its die into your pool. Set that die aside after it is resolved or removed.

name: Pirate Loyalist
text: Power Action – If this character is ready, spot another pirate to give control of this character to an opponent until the end of the action phase. Then take 1 resource from an opponent.

name: Skreek
subtitle: Warbird Enforcer
text:
Piloting.
After you activate this character, if one or more of this character's character dice are showing damage, you may spend 1 resource to remove an opponent's die showing damage.

name: Ziro The Hutt
subtitle: Crime Lord
text: Power Action - Look at the top 4 cards of your deck and play a downgrade from among them. Place the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order. Then deal 1 damage to an opponent's character with a downgrade on it.

name: Everybody Profits
text: Give an opponent 1 resource to deal 3 indirect damage to them.

name: Salvage Run
text: Take 1 resource from an opponent. Spot a scoundrel or pirate to remove an opponent's die showing a value of 2 or less.

name: Triple Dark Attack
text: Ambush. Choose an opponent's character and force them to activate it. Then you may activate one of your pirate characters.

name: Den of Thieves
text:
Discard this support if it has 3 or more resources on it.
Before a Yellow character would be dealt damage, you may place that amount of damage on this card as resources instead.
After an opponent loses 1 or more resources, remove 1 resource from this support.

name: Painful Losses
text: After your effect causes an opponent to lose 1 or more resources, you may exhaust this support. Then deal damage to an opponent's character equal to half the number of pirates or scavengers you can spot, rounded down.

name: Pirate Crew Member
text: Before you resolve this die showing damage, you may increase its value by 1 if all characters on your team share a color.

name: Burryaga Agaburry
subtitle: Savior of Hetzal
text: Power Action - Remove one of this character's character dice showing damage to play an event from hand, reducing its cost by 1.

name: Jaro Tapal
subtitle: Selfless Master
text:
Team Up 1: Cal Kestis.
Guardian.
Before this character takes damage, you may resolve one of its character dice showing damage.

flavor: "Mind what you have learned. Save you it can." <cite>Yoda</cite>
name: Jedi Apprentice
text: Include only if you have a Jedi on your team. Weapons on this character gain redeploy.

flavor: "There is... another." <cite>Yoda</cite>
name: Leia Organa
subtitle: Adept Student
text:
Guardian.
After you activate this character, reveal the top card of your deck. Give a character shields equal to the cost of that card.

name: Luminara Unduli
subtitle: Patient Master
text: Each apprentice character you control has +1 health. [special] - Choose and do two of the following: Discard a random card from an opponent's hand. Give a character 1 shield. Roll an apprentice die on one of your other cards into your pool.

flavor: "There is always hope, my friend..."
name: Qui-Gon Jinn
subtitle: Venerable Maverick
text: This character has +1 shield limit and +1 upgrade limit. Power Action - Remove 1 shield from one of your characters with 3 or more shields to gain 1 resource.

name: Force Mirage
text: Spot 2 Blue characters to resolve one of your dice showing a shield as if it were showing a different symbol.

name: Force Reflexes
text: Choose a Blue die in your pool to remove up to 2 dice showing a combined value less than or equal to the chosen die's value plus 1.

name: Move Along
text: Spot a Blue character that is 17 or more points to either exhaust a non-unique card or remove a non-unique die.

name: You Will Go to the Dagobah System
text: Give 3 shields to one of your apprentice characters. Add a set-aside Jedi Trials ([CM]65) to your team.

name: The Jedi Code
text: Include only if each character on your team is a Jedi or apprentice. Action - Remove one of your dice showing a shield and exhaust this plot to remove an opponent's die showing damage.

name: Force Heal
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Deal 1 damage to one of your characters to heal 2 damage from a different character.

name: Leia Organa's Lightsaber
text:
Before you resolve this die increase its value by the number of shields on attached character.
While this upgrade is on Leia Organa, it gains Redeploy.

name: Admiral Ackbar
subtitle: Brilliant Tactician
text: Piloting. After setup, if this character is elite, you may add a set-aside X-Wing ([AtG]86) to your play area (without paying its cost). After the upkeep phase begins, you may add a set-aside X-Wing ([AtG]86) to your play area (without paying its cost).

flavor: "Many Bothans died to bring us this information" <cite>Mon Mothma</cite>
name: Bothan Spy
text:
Detect.
After this character's Detect ability detects a support or upgrade, you may play a set-aside copy of Death Star Plans ([CM]126) on this character for free.

name: Chewbacca
subtitle: Commanding Force
text: Guardian. After a Guardian ability removes an opponent's character die, deal 1 damage to that die's matching character. Power Action - Move two damage among your characters as you wish.

name: Dak Ralter
subtitle: Rogue Gunner
text:
Piloting.
After you activate this character, move 1 shield from a card you control to another card you control or give 1 shield to one of your characters.

name: General Rieekan
subtitle: Mastermind
text: Power Action - Draw cards equal to the number of this character's character dice showing shields.

name: Rebel Sniper
text: Power Action - Discard a card from your hand to resolve one of this character's character dice, increasing its value by 1.

name: Heroic Protector
text: Activate one of your characters with Guardian. This turn, after that character's Guardian ability removes a die, deal damage to a character equal to the value of the die removed.

name: K-3PO
text: After an opponent claims the battlefield, you may play this card from your discard pile. Power Action - Discard this card from play to use the claim ability or power action on the battlefield, even if it has been used this round.

name: Redemption
text: After you activate this support, roll 2 set-aside Medical Droid ([TP]26) dice into your pool. Set those dice aside after they are resolved or removed.

name: Rogue One
text: After you activate this support, you may remove 1 shield from a card or, if Luke Skywalker or Dak Ralter are piloting this vehicle, you may remove a die showing a value of 0.

name: Rogue Two
text: After you activate this support, spot a unique Red character to reroll a die.

name: Wasaka Berry Plant
text: Action - If all characters on your team share a subtype, exhaust this support to heal 2 damage from a character.

name: Wookiee Fluttercraft
text: After you activate this support, if there is no damage on it, you may move 1 damage from a character with Guardian to this card.

name: Veteran of War
text:
Unique Red character only.
After you play this upgrade, heal 2 damage from attached character.
[special] - Resolve one of your Red dice, increasing its value by 1. Remove an opponent's die.

name: Benthic
subtitle: "Two Tubes"
text: Piloting. After an opponent claims the battlefield, deal 2 damage to a character. Power Action - Deal 1 indirect damage to yourself to remove a die showing damage.

flavor: "Han Solo, ha. If I'm around, you don't need that guy."
name: Dash Rendar
subtitle: Outer Rim Hotshot
text: Piloting. Power Action - Play a Yellow card from your hand, giving it Ambush.

name: Lumpawaroo
subtitle: Chewbacca's Pride
text:
Guardian.
After this character is dealt damage during the action phase, deal half that damage to a character, rounded down.
Before you resolve one of this character's character dice showing damage, increase its value by 1 if this character has 6 or more damage.

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
subtitle: "Rako Hardeen"
text:
You may play Blue upgrades on this character, ignoring play restrictions.
Detect 2.
After you activate this character, if an opponent has a detected event, gain 1 resource.

name: Wullffwarro
text: After setup, you may spot another wookiee to add a set-aside wookiee to your team as elite or non-elite. Deal indirect damage to yourself equal to the added character's point value.

name: Grand Theft Speeder
text: Modify opponent's vehicle support. After attached support is activated, you may discard this downgrade to resolve one of its support or upgrade dice.

name: Let's Make a Deal
text:
Play only if all characters on your team share a color.
Give an opponent 1 resource to remove up to 3 of their dice showing damage.

name: Rallying Cry
text:
Play only if an opponent dealt damage to one of your characters during their last turn.
Spot a Yellow character to remove an opponent's die showing a value of 2 or less.

name: Sound the Horn
text: Include only if you have an Ewok on your team. Each time you play a trap, place a resource on this plot. If this plot has 3 resources, you may set it aside and spend 3 resources to add 4 set-aside Ewok Warriors ([SoH]95) to your team. Place 3 damage on each one.

name: Outrider
text:
After you activate this support, look at the top 2 cards of your deck and place 1 of those cards on the bottom of your deck.
[special] - Play the bottom card of your deck for free or resolve one of your dice without removing it from your pool.

name: Defensive Perimeter
subtitle: Hoth
text: Power Action - Remove one of your dice to give a character 2 shields.

name: Harness the Force
text: Spot a Blue character to turn one of your dice to a side showing a special ([special]). Then you may resolve that die.

name: Rising Whirlwind
text: Spot a Blue character with 2 weapons on it to reroll 2 dice. Then remove one of those dice with the lowest value (you choose in case of a tie).

name: Force Valor
text:
Play only if you spot a Blue character.
[special] - Choose and do two of the following:
 Deal 1 damage to a character.
 Heal 1 damage from a character.
 Turn a die to a side not showing a special ([special]).

name: Jar'Kai
text: Blue character only. Limit 1 form per character. Attached character has +2 upgrade limit. Before you resolve an attached character's weapon die, if attached character has 2 or more weapons on it, increase its value by 1.

name: Lightsaber Tonfa
text:
After you play this upgrade, you may spend 1 resource to place 1 resource on it.
Increase the value of this die by the number of resources on this upgrade.

name: Quilloned Lightsaber
text:
Redeploy.
After you play this upgrade or it is moved to a character, if it is on a hero character, heal 1 damage from it. If it is on a villain character, deal 1 damage to an opponent's character.

name: Power of the Tribe
text: Remove a die. Then, if all characters on your team share a subtype, you may remove another die showing a different symbol and value.

name: Small Battles Won
text: Resolve one of your Red dice showing a value of 1 without removing it from your pool.

name: Tactical Retreat
text: Give control of the battlefield to an opponent to give shields to your characters equal to the number of Red characters you can spot, distributed as you wish.

name: Extra Firepower
text: Action - Set this plot aside to resolve up to 2 of your dice, increasing each of their values by 1.

name: Tactical Superiority
text: Before you play an opponent's card, exhaust this support to decrease its cost by 1.

name: Security Baton
text:
Redeploy.
After you roll this die into your pool, you may reroll it.
Before you resolve this die, you may remove 1 shield from an opponent's character.

name: Doctor Aphra
subtitle: Archaeologist
text: After setup, you may shuffle up to 6 set-aside non-character droids into your deck (ignoring deckbuilding restrictions). After you play a droid, you may deal 1 indirect damage to an opponent.

name: Hondo Ohnaka
subtitle: Ultimate Pragmatist
text:
After you activate this character, you may roll 2 set-aside Pirate Loyalist ([RM]27) dice into your pool.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to an opponent's character, or 3 damage if one of your effects caused an opponent to lose 1 or more resources this round.

name: Dark Memories
text:
Redeploy.
After attached character activates, deal 1 damage to it.

name: Headstrong
text: Spot a Yellow character to remove up to 2 dice that were rolled into the pool last turn.

name: Unfair Trade
text: Resolve one of your dice showing disrupt. Then switch resources with the opponent that die was resolved against.

name: The Ultimate Heist
text: Team Up 1: Each pirate. After one of your effects causes an opponent to lose 1 or more resources, place resources on this plot equal to the number of resources lost. If this plot has 6 or more resources, spot a pirate character to flip this card and attach it to that character.

name: Master of Pirates
text: Power Action - Take 1 resource from an opponent. [special] - Give an opponent 1 of your resources. Then resolve any die (yours or an opponent's) and gain 1 action.

name: Black Market Arm
text: Attached character has +1 health, or +2 health instead if attached character is a pirate or bounty hunter.

name: Hustling
text: [special] - Gain 1 resource or remove a resource from a non-plot card.

name: Syndicate Electrostaff
text:
Play only if all characters on your team share a subtype.
Decrease the resource cost on attached character's character and upgrade dice by 1.

name: Fury
text: Spot a character that is 17 or more points to remove an opponent's die.

name: Mandalorian Executioner Vibro-Ax
text:
Character with 13 or more health only.
Redeploy.
[special] - Deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.

name: Cloud City
subtitle: Bespin
text: Power Action - Look at an opponent's hand and, if you spot a pilot, discard a card from it with a cost of 0. Then that opponent may draw a card.

name: Cyber Center
subtitle: Anexes
text: Claim - Your hand size is increased by 1 until the end of this round (Draw an additional card during the upkeep phase at the end of this round). Heal 1 damage from a character.

name: Perimeter Outpost
subtitle: Hoth
text: Select only if your team has 2 or more Red characters. Power Action - Gain 2 actions. Give control of this battlefield to an opponent.

name: Death of CT-4040
text: 40/40 Format Only. You may include one additional plot on your team. Before setup, shuffle 10 additional cards into your draw deck following normal deckbuilding restrictions. Then set this plot aside.
